6740  str_view parse_flow_scalar_token(lexical_token_t lex_type, str_view token)
6741  {
6742  switch (lex_type)
6743  {
6744  case lexical_token_t::PLAIN_SCALAR:
6745  token = parse_plain_scalar(token);
6746  break;
6747  case lexical_token_t::SINGLE_QUOTED_SCALAR:
6748  token = parse_single_quoted_scalar(token);
6749  break;
6750  case lexical_token_t::DOUBLE_QUOTED_SCALAR:
6751  token = parse_double_quoted_scalar(token);
6752  break;
6753  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
6754  unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
6755  }
6756 
6757  return token;
6758  }
6759 
6763  str_view parse_plain_scalar(str_view token) noexcept
6764  {
6765  // plain scalars cannot be empty.
6766  FK_YAML_ASSERT(!token.empty());
6767 
6768  std::size_t newline_pos = token.find('\n');
6769  if (newline_pos == str_view::npos)
6770  {
6771  return token;
6772  }
6773 
6774  m_use_owned_buffer = true;
6775 
6776  if (m_buffer.capacity() < token.size())
6777  {
6778  m_buffer.reserve(token.size());
6779  }
6780 
6781  do
6782  {
6783  process_line_folding(token, newline_pos);
6784  newline_pos = token.find('\n');
6785  } while (newline_pos != str_view::npos);
6786 
6787  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), token.size());
6788 
6789  return {m_buffer};
6790  }
6791 
6795  str_view parse_single_quoted_scalar(str_view token) noexcept
6796  {
6797  if (token.empty())
6798  {
6799  return token;
6800  }
6801 
6802  constexpr str_view filter{"\'\n"};
6803  std::size_t pos = token.find_first_of(filter);
6804  if (pos == str_view::npos)
6805  {
6806  return token;
6807  }
6808 
6809  m_use_owned_buffer = true;
6810 
6811  if (m_buffer.capacity() < token.size())
6812  {
6813  m_buffer.reserve(token.size());
6814  }
6815 
6816  do
6817  {
6818  FK_YAML_ASSERT(pos < token.size());
6819  FK_YAML_ASSERT(token[pos] == '\'' || token[pos] == '\n');
6820 
6821  if (token[pos] == '\'')
6822  {
6823  // unescape escaped single quote. ('' -> ')
6824  FK_YAML_ASSERT(pos + 1 < token.size());
6825  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), token.begin() + (pos + 1));
6826  token.remove_prefix(pos + 2); // move next to the escaped single quote.
6827  }
6828  else
6829  {
6830  process_line_folding(token, pos);
6831  }
6832 
6833  pos = token.find_first_of(filter);
6834  } while (pos != str_view::npos);
6835 
6836  if (!token.empty())
6837  {
6838  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), token.size());
6839  }
6840 
6841  return {m_buffer};
6842  }
6843 
6847  str_view parse_double_quoted_scalar(str_view token)
6848  {
6849  if (token.empty())
6850  {
6851  return token;
6852  }
6853 
6854  constexpr str_view filter{"\\\n"};
6855  std::size_t pos = token.find_first_of(filter);
6856  if (pos == str_view::npos)
6857  {
6858  return token;
6859  }
6860 
6861  m_use_owned_buffer = true;
6862 
6863  if (m_buffer.capacity() < token.size())
6864  {
6865  m_buffer.reserve(token.size());
6866  }
6867 
6868  do
6869  {
6870  FK_YAML_ASSERT(pos < token.size());
6871  FK_YAML_ASSERT(token[pos] == '\\' || token[pos] == '\n');
6872 
6873  if (token[pos] == '\\')
6874  {
6875  FK_YAML_ASSERT(pos + 1 < token.size());
6876  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), token.begin() + pos);
6877 
6878  if (token[pos + 1] != '\n')
6879  {
6880  token.remove_prefix(pos);
6881  const char *p_escape_begin = token.begin();
6882  const bool is_valid_escaping =
6883  yaml_escaper::unescape(p_escape_begin, token.end(), m_buffer);
6884  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_valid_escaping)
6885  {
6886  throw parse_error(
6887  "Unsupported escape sequence is found in a double quoted scalar.",
6888  m_line, m_indent);
6889  }
6890 
6891  // `p_escape_begin` points to the last element of the escape sequence.
6892  token.remove_prefix((p_escape_begin - token.begin()) + 1);
6893  }
6894  else
6895  {
6896  std::size_t non_space_pos = token.find_first_not_of(" \t", pos + 2);
6897  if (non_space_pos == str_view::npos)
6898  {
6899  non_space_pos = token.size();
6900  }
6901  token.remove_prefix(non_space_pos);
6902  }
6903  }
6904  else
6905  {
6906  process_line_folding(token, pos);
6907  }
6908 
6909  pos = token.find_first_of(filter);
6910  } while (pos != str_view::npos);
6911 
6912  if (!token.empty())
6913  {
6914  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), token.size());
6915  }
6916 
6917  return {m_buffer};
6918  }
6919 
6924  str_view parse_block_literal_scalar(str_view token, const block_scalar_header &header)
6925  {
6926  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (token.empty())
6927  {
6928  return token;
6929  }
6930 
6931  m_use_owned_buffer = true;
6932  m_buffer.reserve(token.size());
6933 
6934  std::size_t cur_line_begin_pos = 0;
6935  do
6936  {
6937  bool has_newline_at_end = true;
6938  std::size_t cur_line_end_pos = token.find('\n', cur_line_begin_pos);
6939  if (cur_line_end_pos == str_view::npos)
6940  {
6941  has_newline_at_end = false;
6942  cur_line_end_pos = token.size();
6943  }
6944 
6945  const std::size_t line_size = cur_line_end_pos - cur_line_begin_pos;
6946  const str_view line = token.substr(cur_line_begin_pos, line_size);
6947 
6948  if (line.size() > header.indent)
6949  {
6950  m_buffer.append(line.begin() + header.indent, line.end());
6951  }
6952 
6953  if (!has_newline_at_end)
6954  {
6955  break;
6956  }
6957 
6958  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
6959  cur_line_begin_pos = cur_line_end_pos + 1;
6960  } while (cur_line_begin_pos < token.size());
6961 
6962  process_chomping(header.chomp);
6963 
6964  return {m_buffer};
6965  }
6966 
6971  str_view parse_block_folded_scalar(str_view token, const block_scalar_header &header)
6972  {
6973  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (token.empty())
6974  {
6975  return token;
6976  }
6977 
6978  m_use_owned_buffer = true;
6979  m_buffer.reserve(token.size());
6980 
6981  constexpr str_view white_space_filter{" \t"};
6982 
6983  std::size_t cur_line_begin_pos = 0;
6984  bool has_newline_at_end = true;
6985  bool can_be_folded = false;
6986  do
6987  {
6988  std::size_t cur_line_end_pos = token.find('\n', cur_line_begin_pos);
6989  if (cur_line_end_pos == str_view::npos)
6990  {
6991  has_newline_at_end = false;
6992  cur_line_end_pos = token.size();
6993  }
6994 
6995  const std::size_t line_size = cur_line_end_pos - cur_line_begin_pos;
6996  const str_view line = token.substr(cur_line_begin_pos, line_size);
6997  const bool is_empty = line.find_first_not_of(white_space_filter) == str_view::npos;
6998 
6999  if (line.size() <= header.indent)
7000  {
7001  // A less-indented line is turned into a newline.
7002  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7003  can_be_folded = false;
7004  }
7005  else if (is_empty)
7006  {
7007  // more-indented empty lines are not folded.
7008  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7009  m_buffer.append(line.begin() + header.indent, line.end());
7010  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7011  }
7012  else
7013  {
7014  const std::size_t non_space_pos = line.find_first_not_of(white_space_filter);
7015  const bool is_more_indented =
7016  (non_space_pos != str_view::npos) && (non_space_pos > header.indent);
7017 
7018  if (can_be_folded)
7019  {
7020  if (is_more_indented)
7021  {
7022  // The content line right before more-indented lines is not folded.
7023  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7024  }
7025  else
7026  {
7027  m_buffer.push_back(' ');
7028  }
7029 
7030  can_be_folded = false;
7031  }
7032 
7033  m_buffer.append(line.begin() + header.indent, line.end());
7034 
7035  if (is_more_indented && has_newline_at_end)
7036  {
7037  // more-indented lines are not folded.
7038  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7039  }
7040  else
7041  {
7042  can_be_folded = true;
7043  }
7044  }
7045 
7046  if (!has_newline_at_end)
7047  {
7048  break;
7049  }
7050 
7051  cur_line_begin_pos = cur_line_end_pos + 1;
7052  } while (cur_line_begin_pos < token.size());
7053 
7054  if (has_newline_at_end && can_be_folded)
7055  {
7056  // The final content line break are not folded.
7057  m_buffer.push_back('\n');
7058  }
7059 
7060  process_chomping(header.chomp);
7061 
7062  return {m_buffer};
7063  }
7064 
7068  void process_chomping(chomping_indicator_t chomp)
7069  {
7070  switch (chomp)
7071  {
7072  case chomping_indicator_t::STRIP: {
7073  const std::size_t content_end_pos = m_buffer.find_last_not_of('\n');
7074  if (content_end_pos == std::string::npos)
7075  {
7076  // if the scalar has no content line, all lines are considered as trailing empty
7077  // lines.
7078  m_buffer.clear();
7079  break;
7080  }
7081 
7082  if (content_end_pos == m_buffer.size() - 1)
7083  {
7084  // no last content line break nor trailing empty lines.
7085  break;
7086  }
7087 
7088  // remove the last content line break and all trailing empty lines.
7089  m_buffer.erase(content_end_pos + 1);
7090 
7091  break;
7092  }
7093  case chomping_indicator_t::CLIP: {
7094  const std::size_t content_end_pos = m_buffer.find_last_not_of('\n');
7095  if (content_end_pos == std::string::npos)
7096  {
7097  // if the scalar has no content line, all lines are considered as trailing empty
7098  // lines.
7099  m_buffer.clear();
7100  break;
7101  }
7102 
7103  if (content_end_pos == m_buffer.size() - 1)
7104  {
7105  // no trailing empty lines
7106  break;
7107  }
7108 
7109  // remove all trailing empty lines.
7110  m_buffer.erase(content_end_pos + 2);
7111 
7112  break;
7113  }
7114  case chomping_indicator_t::KEEP:
7115  break;
7116  }
7117  }
7118 
7122  void process_line_folding(str_view &token, std::size_t newline_pos) noexcept
7123  {
7124  // discard trailing white spaces which precedes the line break in the current line.
7125  const std::size_t last_non_space_pos =
7126  token.substr(0, newline_pos + 1).find_last_not_of(" \t");
7127  if (last_non_space_pos == str_view::npos)
7128  {
7129  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), newline_pos);
7130  }
7131  else
7132  {
7133  m_buffer.append(token.begin(), last_non_space_pos + 1);
7134  }
7135  token.remove_prefix(newline_pos + 1); // move next to the LF
7136 
7137  uint32_t empty_line_counts = 0;
7138  do
7139  {
7140  const std::size_t non_space_pos = token.find_first_not_of(" \t");
7141  if (non_space_pos == str_view::npos)
7142  {
7143  // Line folding ignores trailing spaces.
7144  token.remove_prefix(token.size());
7145  break;
7146  }
7147  if (token[non_space_pos] != '\n')
7148  {
7149  token.remove_prefix(non_space_pos);
7150  break;
7151  }
7152 
7153  token.remove_prefix(non_space_pos + 1);
7154  ++empty_line_counts;
7155  } while (true);
7156 
7157  if (empty_line_counts > 0)
7158  {
7159  m_buffer.append(empty_line_counts, '\n');
7160  }
7161  else
7162  {
7163  m_buffer.push_back(' ');
7164  }
7165  }
7166 
7172  node_type decide_value_type(lexical_token_t lex_type, tag_t tag_type,
7173  str_view token) const noexcept
7174  {
7175  node_type value_type{node_type::STRING};
7176  if (lex_type == lexical_token_t::PLAIN_SCALAR)
7177  {
7178  value_type = scalar_scanner::scan(token.begin(), token.end());
7179  }
7180 
7181  switch (tag_type)
7182  {
7183  case tag_t::NULL_VALUE:
7184  value_type = node_type::NULL_OBJECT;
7185  break;
7186  case tag_t::BOOLEAN:
7187  value_type = node_type::BOOLEAN;
7188  break;
7189  case tag_t::INTEGER:
7190  value_type = node_type::INTEGER;
7191  break;
7192  case tag_t::FLOATING_NUMBER:
7193  value_type = node_type::FLOAT;
7194  break;
7195  case tag_t::STRING:
7196  case tag_t::NON_SPECIFIC:
7197  // scalars with the non-specific tag is resolved to a string tag.
7198  // See the "Non-Specific Tags" section in https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/#691-node-tags.
7199  value_type = node_type::STRING;
7200  break;
7201  case tag_t::NONE:
7202  case tag_t::CUSTOM_TAG:
7203  default:
7204  break;
7205  }
7206 
7207  return value_type;
7208  }
7209 
7214  basic_node_type create_scalar_node(node_type val_type, tag_t tag_type, str_view token)
7215  {
7216  switch (val_type)
7217  {
7218  case node_type::NULL_OBJECT: {
7219  std::nullptr_t null = nullptr;
7220  const bool converted = detail::aton(token.begin(), token.end(), null);
7221  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!converted)
7222  {
7223  throw parse_error("Failed to convert a scalar to a null.", m_line, m_indent);
7224  }
7225  // The default basic_node object is a null scalar node.
7226  return basic_node_type{};
7227  }
7228  case node_type::BOOLEAN: {
7229  auto boolean = static_cast<boolean_type>(false);
7230  const bool converted = detail::atob(token.begin(), token.end(), boolean);
7231  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!converted)
7232  {
7233  throw parse_error("Failed to convert a scalar to a boolean.", m_line, m_indent);
7234  }
7235  return basic_node_type(boolean);
7236  }
7237  case node_type::INTEGER: {
7238  integer_type integer = 0;
7239  const bool converted = detail::atoi(token.begin(), token.end(), integer);
7240  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (converted)
7241  {
7242  return basic_node_type(integer);
7243  }
7244  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tag_type == tag_t::INTEGER)
7245  {
7246  throw parse_error("Failed to convert a scalar to an integer.", m_line, m_indent);
7247  }
7248 
7249  // conversion error from a scalar which is not tagged with !!int is recovered by
7250  // treating it as a string scalar. See https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML/issues/428.
7251  return basic_node_type(string_type(token.begin(), token.end()));
7252  }
7253  case node_type::FLOAT: {
7254  float_number_type float_val = 0;
7255  const bool converted = detail::atof(token.begin(), token.end(), float_val);
7256  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (converted)
7257  {
7258  return basic_node_type(float_val);
7259  }
7260  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tag_type == tag_t::FLOATING_NUMBER)
7261  {
7262  throw parse_error("Failed to convert a scalar to a floating point value", m_line,
7263  m_indent);
7264  }
7265 
7266  // conversion error from a scalar which is not tagged with !!float is recovered by
7267  // treating it as a string scalar. See https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML/issues/428.
7268  return basic_node_type(string_type(token.begin(), token.end()));
7269  }
7270  case node_type::STRING:
7271  if (!m_use_owned_buffer)
7272  {
7273  return basic_node_type(string_type(token.begin(), token.end()));
7274  }
7275  m_use_owned_buffer = false;
7276  return basic_node_type(std::move(m_buffer));
7277  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7278  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7279  }
7280  }
7281 
7283  uint32_t m_line{0};
7285  uint32_t m_indent{0};
7287  bool m_use_owned_buffer{false};
7289  std::string m_buffer;
7290 };
7291 
7292 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
7293 
7294 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_SCALAR_PARSER_HPP */
7295 
7296 // #include <fkYAML/detail/input/tag_resolver.hpp>
7297 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
7298 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
7299 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
7300 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
7301 //
7302 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
7303 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7304 
7305 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_TAG_RESOLVER_HPP
7306 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_TAG_RESOLVER_HPP
7307 
7308 #include <memory>
7309 #include <string>
7310 
7311 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
7312 
7313 // #include <fkYAML/detail/assert.hpp>
7314 
7315 // #include <fkYAML/detail/document_metainfo.hpp>
7316 
7317 // #include <fkYAML/detail/input/tag_t.hpp>
7318 
7319 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/node_traits.hpp>
7320 
7321 // #include <fkYAML/detail/str_view.hpp>
7322 
7323 // #include <fkYAML/exception.hpp>
7324 
7325 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
7326 
7327 static constexpr str_view default_primary_handle_prefix{"!"};
7328 static constexpr str_view default_secondary_handle_prefix{"tag:yaml.org,2002:"};
7329 
7330 template <typename BasicNodeType> class tag_resolver
7331 {
7332  static_assert(is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value,
7333  "tag_resolver only accepts basic_node<...>.");
7334  using doc_metainfo_type = document_metainfo<BasicNodeType>;
7335 
7336  public:
7341  static tag_t resolve_tag(const std::string &tag,
7342  const std::shared_ptr<doc_metainfo_type> &directives)
7343  {
7344  const std::string normalized = normalize_tag_name(tag, directives);
7345  return convert_to_tag_type(normalized);
7346  }
7347 
7348  private:
7349  static std::string normalize_tag_name(const std::string &tag,
7350  const std::shared_ptr<doc_metainfo_type> &directives)
7351  {
7352  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tag.empty())
7353  {
7354  throw invalid_tag("tag must not be empty.", "");
7355  }
7356  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tag[0] != '!')
7357  {
7358  throw invalid_tag("tag must start with \'!\'", tag.c_str());
7359  }
7360 
7361  if (tag.size() == 1)
7362  {
7363  // Non-specific tag ("!") will be interpreted as one of the following:
7364  // * tag:yaml.org,2002:seq
7365  // * tag:yaml.org,2002:map
7366  // * tag:yaml.org,2002:str
7367  // See the "Non-Specific Tags" section in https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/#691-node-tags.
7368  // The interpretation cannot take place here because the input lacks the corresponding
7369  // value.
7370  return tag;
7371  }
7372 
7373  std::string normalized{"!<"};
7374  switch (tag[1])
7375  {
7376  case '!': {
7377  // handle a secondary tag handle (!!suffix -> !<[secondary][suffix]>)
7378  const bool is_null_or_empty =
7379  !directives || directives->secondary_handle_prefix.empty();
7380  if (is_null_or_empty)
7381  {
7382  normalized.append(default_secondary_handle_prefix.begin(),
7383  default_secondary_handle_prefix.end());
7384  normalized += tag.substr(2);
7385  }
7386  else
7387  {
7388  normalized += directives->secondary_handle_prefix + tag.substr(2);
7389  }
7390  break;
7391  }
7392  case '<':
7393  if (tag[2] == '!')
7394  {
7395  const bool is_null_or_empty =
7396  !directives || directives->primary_handle_prefix.empty();
7397  if (is_null_or_empty)
7398  {
7399  normalized.append(default_primary_handle_prefix.begin(),
7400  default_primary_handle_prefix.end());
7401  return normalized + tag.substr(3);
7402  }
7403  return normalized + directives->primary_handle_prefix + tag.substr(3);
7404  }
7405 
7406  // verbatim tags must be delivered as-is to the application.
7407  // See https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/#691-node-tags for more details.
7408  return tag;
7409  default: {
7410  auto tag_end_pos = tag.find_first_of('!', 1);
7411 
7412  // handle a named handle (!tag!suffix -> !<[tag][suffix]>)
7413  if (tag_end_pos != std::string::npos)
7414  {
7415  // there must be a non-empty suffix. (already checked by the lexer.)
7416  FK_YAML_ASSERT(tag_end_pos < tag.size() - 1);
7417 
7418  const bool is_null_or_empty = !directives || directives->named_handle_map.empty();
7419  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_null_or_empty)
7420  {
7421  throw invalid_tag("named handle has not been registered.", tag.c_str());
7422  }
7423 
7424  // find the extracted named handle in the map.
7425  auto named_handle_itr =
7426  directives->named_handle_map.find(tag.substr(0, tag_end_pos + 1));
7427  auto end_itr = directives->named_handle_map.end();
7428  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (named_handle_itr == end_itr)
7429  {
7430  throw invalid_tag("named handle has not been registered.", tag.c_str());
7431  }
7432 
7433  // The YAML spec prohibits expanding the percent-encoded characters (%xx -> a UTF-8
7434  // byte). So no conversion takes place. See
7435  // https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/#56-miscellaneous-characters for more details.
7436 
7437  normalized += named_handle_itr->second;
7438  normalized.append(tag.begin() + (static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(tag_end_pos) + 1),
7439  tag.end());
7440  break;
7441  }
7442 
7443  // handle a primary tag handle (!suffix -> !<[primary][suffix]>)
7444  const bool is_null_or_empty = !directives || directives->primary_handle_prefix.empty();
7445  if (is_null_or_empty)
7446  {
7447  normalized.append(default_primary_handle_prefix.begin(),
7448  default_primary_handle_prefix.end());
7449  normalized += tag.substr(1);
7450  }
7451  else
7452  {
7453  normalized += directives->primary_handle_prefix + tag.substr(1);
7454  }
7455 
7456  break;
7457  }
7458  }
7459 
7460  normalized += ">";
7461  return normalized;
7462  }
7463 
7464  static tag_t convert_to_tag_type(const std::string &normalized)
7465  {
7466  if (normalized == "!")
7467  {
7468  return tag_t::NON_SPECIFIC;
7469  }
7470 
7471  if (normalized.size() < 24 /* size of !<tag:yaml.org,2002:xxx */)
7472  {
7473  return tag_t::CUSTOM_TAG;
7474  }
7475  if (normalized.rfind("!<tag:yaml.org,2002:", 0) == std::string::npos)
7476  {
7477  return tag_t::CUSTOM_TAG;
7478  }
7479 
7480  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:seq>")
7481  {
7482  return tag_t::SEQUENCE;
7483  }
7484  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:map>")
7485  {
7486  return tag_t::MAPPING;
7487  }
7488  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:null>")
7489  {
7490  return tag_t::NULL_VALUE;
7491  }
7492  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:bool>")
7493  {
7494  return tag_t::BOOLEAN;
7495  }
7496  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:int>")
7497  {
7498  return tag_t::INTEGER;
7499  }
7500  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:float>")
7501  {
7502  return tag_t::FLOATING_NUMBER;
7503  }
7504  if (normalized == "!<tag:yaml.org,2002:str>")
7505  {
7506  return tag_t::STRING;
7507  }
7508 
7509  return tag_t::CUSTOM_TAG;
7510  }
7511 };
7512 
7513 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
7514 
7515 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_TAG_RESOLVER_HPP */
7516 
7517 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/input_adapter_traits.hpp>
7518 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
7519 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
7520 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
7521 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
7522 //
7523 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
7524 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7525 
7526 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_META_INPUT_ADAPTER_TRAITS_HPP
7527 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_META_INPUT_ADAPTER_TRAITS_HPP
7528 
7529 #include <array>
7530 #include <string>
7531 #include <type_traits>
7532 #include <vector>
7533 
7534 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
7535 
7536 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/detect.hpp>
7537 
7538 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/stl_supplement.hpp>
7539 
7540 #if defined(FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17) && FK_YAML_HAS_INCLUDE(<string_view>)
7541 #include <string_view>
7542 #endif
7543 
7544 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
7545 
7547 // Input Adapter API detection traits
7549 
7552 template <typename T> using get_buffer_view_fn_t = decltype(std::declval<T>().get_buffer_view());
7553 
7557 template <typename InputAdapterType, typename = void> struct has_get_buffer_view : std::false_type
7558 {
7559 };
7560 
7564 template <typename InputAdapterType>
7565 struct has_get_buffer_view<InputAdapterType,
7566  enable_if_t<is_detected<get_buffer_view_fn_t, InputAdapterType>::value>>
7567  : std::true_type
7568 {
7569 };
7570 
7572 // is_input_adapter traits
7574 
7578 template <typename T, typename = void> struct is_input_adapter : std::false_type
7579 {
7580 };
7581 
7584 template <typename InputAdapterType>
7585 struct is_input_adapter<InputAdapterType, enable_if_t<has_get_buffer_view<InputAdapterType>::value>>
7586  : std::true_type
7587 {
7588 };
7589 
7591 // traits for contiguous iterator detection
7593 
7596 template <typename T> struct is_contiguous_container : std::false_type
7597 {
7598 };
7599 
7603 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
7604 struct is_contiguous_container<std::array<T, N>> : std::true_type
7605 {
7606 };
7607 
7612 template <typename CharT, typename Traits, typename Alloc>
7613 struct is_contiguous_container<std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc>> : std::true_type
7614 {
7615 };
7616 
7617 #ifdef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
7618 
7622 template <typename CharT, typename Traits>
7623 struct is_contiguous_container<std::basic_string_view<CharT, Traits>> : std::true_type
7624 {
7625 };
7626 
7627 #endif // defined(FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_20)
7628 
7632 template <typename T, typename Alloc>
7633 struct is_contiguous_container<std::vector<T, Alloc>> : std::true_type
7634 {
7635 };
7636 
7637 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
7638 
7639 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_META_INPUT_ADAPTER_TRAITS_HPP */
7640 
7641 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/node_traits.hpp>
7642 
7643 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/stl_supplement.hpp>
7644 
7645 // #include <fkYAML/detail/node_attrs.hpp>
7646 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
7647 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
7648 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
7649 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
7650 //
7651 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
7652 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7653 
7654 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_ATTRS_HPP
7655 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_ATTRS_HPP
7656 
7657 #include <cstdint>
7658 #include <limits>
7659 
7660 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
7661 
7662 // #include <fkYAML/node_type.hpp>
7663 
7664 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
7665 
7667 using node_attr_t = uint32_t;
7668 
7670 namespace node_attr_mask
7671 {
7672 
7674 constexpr node_attr_t value = 0x0000FFFFu;
7676 constexpr node_attr_t style = 0x00FF0000u;
7678 constexpr node_attr_t props = 0xFF000000u;
7680 constexpr node_attr_t anchoring = 0x03000000u;
7682 constexpr node_attr_t anchor_offset = 0xFC000000u;
7684 constexpr node_attr_t all = std::numeric_limits<node_attr_t>::max();
7685 
7686 } // namespace node_attr_mask
7687 
7689 namespace node_attr_bits
7690 {
7691 
7693 constexpr node_attr_t seq_bit = 1u << 0;
7695 constexpr node_attr_t map_bit = 1u << 1;
7697 constexpr node_attr_t null_bit = 1u << 2;
7699 constexpr node_attr_t bool_bit = 1u << 3;
7701 constexpr node_attr_t int_bit = 1u << 4;
7703 constexpr node_attr_t float_bit = 1u << 5;
7705 constexpr node_attr_t string_bit = 1u << 6;
7706 
7708 constexpr node_attr_t scalar_bits = null_bit | bool_bit | int_bit | float_bit | string_bit;
7709 
7711 constexpr node_attr_t anchor_bit = 0x01000000u;
7713 constexpr node_attr_t alias_bit = 0x02000000u;
7714 
7716 constexpr node_attr_t default_bits = null_bit;
7717 
7721 inline node_attr_t from_node_type(node_type t) noexcept
7722 {
7723  switch (t)
7724  {
7725  case node_type::SEQUENCE:
7726  return seq_bit;
7727  case node_type::MAPPING:
7728  return map_bit;
7729  case node_type::NULL_OBJECT:
7730  return null_bit;
7731  case node_type::BOOLEAN:
7732  return bool_bit;
7733  case node_type::INTEGER:
7734  return int_bit;
7735  case node_type::FLOAT:
7736  return float_bit;
7737  case node_type::STRING:
7738  return string_bit;
7739  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7740  return node_attr_mask::all; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7741  }
7742 }
7743 
7747 inline node_type to_node_type(node_attr_t bits) noexcept
7748 {
7749  switch (bits & node_attr_mask::value)
7750  {
7751  case seq_bit:
7752  return node_type::SEQUENCE;
7753  case map_bit:
7754  return node_type::MAPPING;
7755  case null_bit:
7756  return node_type::NULL_OBJECT;
7757  case bool_bit:
7758  return node_type::BOOLEAN;
7759  case int_bit:
7760  return node_type::INTEGER;
7761  case float_bit:
7762  return node_type::FLOAT;
7763  case string_bit:
7764  return node_type::STRING;
7765  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7766  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7767  }
7768 }
7769 
7773 inline uint32_t get_anchor_offset(node_attr_t attrs) noexcept
7774 {
7775  return (attrs & node_attr_mask::anchor_offset) >> 26;
7776 }
7777 
7781 inline void set_anchor_offset(uint32_t offset, node_attr_t &attrs) noexcept
7782 {
7783  attrs &= ~node_attr_mask::anchor_offset;
7784  attrs |= (offset & 0x3Fu) << 26;
7785 }
7786 
7787 } // namespace node_attr_bits
7788 
7789 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
7790 
7791 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_ATTRS_HPP */
7792 
7793 // #include <fkYAML/detail/node_property.hpp>
7794 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
7795 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
7796 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
7797 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
7798 //
7799 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
7800 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7801 
7802 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_PROPERTY_HPP
7803 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_PROPERTY_HPP
7804 
7805 #include <string>
7806 
7807 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
7808 
7809 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
7810 
7811 struct node_property
7812 {
7814  std::string tag{}; // NOLINT(readability-redundant-member-init) necessary for older compilers
7816  std::string anchor{}; // NOLINT(readability-redundant-member-init) necessary for older compilers
7817 };
7818 
7819 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
7820 
7821 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_NODE_PROPERTY_HPP */
7822 
7823 // #include <fkYAML/detail/types/lexical_token_t.hpp>
7824 
7825 // #include <fkYAML/exception.hpp>
7826 
7827 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
7828 
7831 template <typename BasicNodeType> class basic_deserializer
7832 {
7833  static_assert(is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value,
7834  "basic_deserializer only accepts basic_node<...>");
7835 
7837  using basic_node_type = BasicNodeType;
7839  using lexer_type = lexical_analyzer;
7841  using doc_metainfo_type = document_metainfo<basic_node_type>;
7843  using tag_resolver_type = tag_resolver<basic_node_type>;
7845  using scalar_parser_type = scalar_parser<basic_node_type>;
7847  using sequence_type = typename basic_node_type::sequence_type;
7849  using mapping_type = typename basic_node_type::mapping_type;
7850 
7852  enum class context_state_t : std::uint8_t
7853  {
7854  BLOCK_MAPPING,
7855  BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY,
7856  BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_VALUE,
7857  MAPPING_VALUE,
7858  BLOCK_SEQUENCE,
7859  BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY,
7860  FLOW_SEQUENCE,
7861  FLOW_SEQUENCE_KEY,
7862  FLOW_MAPPING,
7863  FLOW_MAPPING_KEY,
7864  };
7865 
7867  struct parse_context
7868  {
7870  parse_context() = default;
7871 
7877  parse_context(uint32_t line, uint32_t indent, context_state_t state,
7878  basic_node_type *p_node) noexcept
7879  : line(line), indent(indent), state(state), p_node(p_node)
7880  {
7881  }
7882 
7883  parse_context(const parse_context &) noexcept = default;
7884  parse_context &operator=(const parse_context &) noexcept = default;
7885  parse_context(parse_context &&) noexcept = default;
7886  parse_context &operator=(parse_context &&) noexcept = default;
7887 
7888  ~parse_context()
7889  {
7890  switch (state)
7891  {
7892  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY:
7893  case context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE_KEY:
7894  case context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING_KEY:
7895  delete p_node;
7896  p_node = nullptr;
7897  break;
7898  default:
7899  break;
7900  }
7901  }
7902 
7904  uint32_t line{0};
7906  uint32_t indent{0};
7908  context_state_t state{context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING};
7910  basic_node_type *p_node{nullptr};
7911  };
7912 
7914  enum class flow_token_state_t : std::uint8_t
7915  {
7916  NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX,
7917  NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX,
7918  };
7919 
7920  public:
7922  basic_deserializer() = default;
7923 
7924  public:
7933  template <typename InputAdapterType,
7934  enable_if_t<is_input_adapter<InputAdapterType>::value, int> = 0>
7935  basic_node_type deserialize(InputAdapterType &&input_adapter)
7936  { // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
7937  const str_view input_view = input_adapter.get_buffer_view();
7938  lexer_type lexer(input_view);
7939 
7940  lexical_token_t type{lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER};
7941  return deserialize_document(lexer, type);
7942  }
7943 
7948  template <typename InputAdapterType,
7949  enable_if_t<is_input_adapter<InputAdapterType>::value, int> = 0>
7950  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
7951  std::vector<basic_node_type> deserialize_docs(InputAdapterType &&input_adapter)
7952  {
7953  const str_view input_view = input_adapter.get_buffer_view();
7954  lexer_type lexer(input_view);
7955 
7956  std::vector<basic_node_type> nodes{};
7957  lexical_token_t type{lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER};
7958 
7959  do
7960  {
7961  nodes.emplace_back(deserialize_document(lexer, type));
7962  } while (type != lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER);
7963 
7964  return nodes;
7965  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7966 
7967  private:
7972  basic_node_type deserialize_document(lexer_type &lexer, lexical_token_t &last_type)
7973  {
7974  lexical_token token{};
7975 
7976  basic_node_type root;
7977  mp_current_node = &root;
7978  mp_meta = root.mp_meta;
7979 
7980  // parse directives first.
7981  deserialize_directives(lexer, token);
7982 
7983  // parse node properties for root node if any
7984  uint32_t line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
7985  uint32_t indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
7986  const bool found_props = deserialize_node_properties(lexer, token, line, indent);
7987 
7988  switch (token.type)
7989  {
7990  case lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_BLOCK_PREFIX: {
7991  root = basic_node_type::sequence({basic_node_type()});
7992  apply_directive_set(root);
7993  if (found_props)
7994  {
7995  // If node properties are found before the block sequence entry prefix, the
7996  // properties belong to the root sequence node.
7997  apply_node_properties(root);
7998  }
7999 
8000  parse_context context(lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos(),
8001  context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE, &root);
8002  m_context_stack.emplace_back(context);
8003 
8004  mp_current_node = &(root.template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8005  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8006  context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY;
8007  context.p_node = mp_current_node;
8008  m_context_stack.emplace_back(std::move(context));
8009 
8010  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8011  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8012  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8013  break;
8014  }
8015  case lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_FLOW_BEGIN:
8016  ++m_flow_context_depth;
8017  lexer.set_context_state(true);
8018  root = basic_node_type::sequence();
8019  apply_directive_set(root);
8020  apply_node_properties(root);
8021  m_context_stack.emplace_back(lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8022  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos(),
8023  context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE, &root);
8024  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8025  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8026  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8027  break;
8028  case lexical_token_t::MAPPING_FLOW_BEGIN:
8029  ++m_flow_context_depth;
8030  lexer.set_context_state(true);
8031  root = basic_node_type::mapping();
8032  apply_directive_set(root);
8033  apply_node_properties(root);
8034  m_context_stack.emplace_back(lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8035  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos(),
8036  context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING, &root);
8037  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8038  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8039  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8040  break;
8041  case lexical_token_t::EXPLICIT_KEY_PREFIX: {
8042  // If the explicit key prefix (? ) is detected here, the root node of current document
8043  // must be a mapping. Also, tag and anchor if any are associated to the root mapping
8044  // node. No get_next_token() call here to handle the token event in the
8045  // deserialize_node() function.
8046  root = basic_node_type::mapping();
8047  apply_directive_set(root);
8048  apply_node_properties(root);
8049  parse_context context(lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos(),
8050  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING, &root);
8051  m_context_stack.emplace_back(std::move(context));
8052  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8053  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8054  break;
8055  }
8056  case lexical_token_t::BLOCK_LITERAL_SCALAR:
8057  case lexical_token_t::BLOCK_FOLDED_SCALAR:
8058  // If a block scalar token is detected here, current document contains single scalar.
8059  // Do nothing here since the token is handled in the deserialize_node() function.
8060  break;
8061  case lexical_token_t::PLAIN_SCALAR:
8062  case lexical_token_t::SINGLE_QUOTED_SCALAR:
8063  case lexical_token_t::DOUBLE_QUOTED_SCALAR:
8064  case lexical_token_t::ALIAS_PREFIX:
8065  // Defer handling the above token events until the next call on the deserialize_scalar()
8066  // function since the meaning depends on subsequent events.
8067  if (found_props && line < lexer.get_lines_processed())
8068  {
8069  // If node properties and a followed node are on the different line, the properties
8070  // belong to the root node.
8071  if (m_needs_anchor_impl)
8072  {
8073  m_root_anchor_name = std::move(m_anchor_name);
8074  m_needs_anchor_impl = false;
8075  m_anchor_name.clear();
8076  }
8077 
8078  if (m_needs_tag_impl)
8079  {
8080  m_root_tag_name = std::move(m_tag_name);
8081  m_needs_tag_impl = false;
8082  m_tag_name.clear();
8083  }
8084 
8085  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8086  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8087  }
8088  break;
8089  default:
8090  // Do nothing since current document has no contents.
8091  break;
8092  }
8093 
8094  // parse YAML nodes recursively
8095  deserialize_node(lexer, token, line, indent, last_type);
8096  FK_YAML_ASSERT(last_type == lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER ||
8097  last_type == lexical_token_t::END_OF_DIRECTIVES ||
8098  last_type == lexical_token_t::END_OF_DOCUMENT);
8099 
8100  // reset parameters for the next call.
8101  mp_current_node = nullptr;
8102  mp_meta.reset();
8103  m_needs_tag_impl = false;
8104  m_needs_anchor_impl = false;
8105  m_flow_context_depth = 0;
8106  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8107  m_context_stack.clear();
8108 
8109  return root;
8110  }
8111 
8115  void deserialize_directives(lexer_type &lexer, lexical_token &last_token)
8116  {
8117  bool lacks_end_of_directives_marker = false;
8118  lexer.set_document_state(true);
8119 
8120  for (;;)
8121  {
8122  const lexical_token token = lexer.get_next_token();
8123 
8124  switch (token.type)
8125  {
8126  case lexical_token_t::YAML_VER_DIRECTIVE:
8127  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (mp_meta->is_version_specified)
8128  {
8129  throw parse_error("YAML version cannot be specified more than once.",
8130  lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8131  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8132  }
8133 
8134  mp_meta->version = convert_yaml_version(lexer.get_yaml_version());
8135  mp_meta->is_version_specified = true;
8136  lacks_end_of_directives_marker = true;
8137  break;
8138  case lexical_token_t::TAG_DIRECTIVE: {
8139  const str_view tag_handle_view = lexer.get_tag_handle();
8140  switch (tag_handle_view.size())
8141  {
8142  case 1 /* ! */: {
8143  const bool is_already_specified = !mp_meta->primary_handle_prefix.empty();
8144  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_already_specified)
8145  {
8146  throw parse_error("Primary handle cannot be specified more than once.",
8147  lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8148  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8149  }
8150  const str_view tag_prefix = lexer.get_tag_prefix();
8151  mp_meta->primary_handle_prefix.assign(tag_prefix.begin(), tag_prefix.end());
8152  lacks_end_of_directives_marker = true;
8153  break;
8154  }
8155  case 2 /* !! */: {
8156  const bool is_already_specified = !mp_meta->secondary_handle_prefix.empty();
8157  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_already_specified)
8158  {
8159  throw parse_error("Secondary handle cannot be specified more than once.",
8160  lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8161  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8162  }
8163  const str_view tag_prefix = lexer.get_tag_prefix();
8164  mp_meta->secondary_handle_prefix.assign(tag_prefix.begin(), tag_prefix.end());
8165  lacks_end_of_directives_marker = true;
8166  break;
8167  }
8168  default /* !<handle>! */: {
8169  std::string tag_handle(tag_handle_view.begin(), tag_handle_view.end());
8170  const str_view tag_prefix_view = lexer.get_tag_prefix();
8171  std::string tag_prefix(tag_prefix_view.begin(), tag_prefix_view.end());
8172  const bool is_already_specified =
8173  !(mp_meta->named_handle_map
8174  .emplace(std::move(tag_handle), std::move(tag_prefix))
8175  .second);
8176  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_already_specified)
8177  {
8178  throw parse_error(
8179  "The same named handle cannot be specified more than once.",
8180  lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8181  }
8182  lacks_end_of_directives_marker = true;
8183  break;
8184  }
8185  }
8186  break;
8187  }
8188  case lexical_token_t::INVALID_DIRECTIVE:
8189  // TODO: should output a warning log. Currently just ignore this case.
8190  break;
8191  case lexical_token_t::END_OF_DIRECTIVES:
8192  lacks_end_of_directives_marker = false;
8193  break;
8194  default:
8195  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (lacks_end_of_directives_marker)
8196  {
8197  throw parse_error(
8198  "The end of directives marker (---) is missing after directives.",
8199  lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8200  }
8201  // end the parsing of directives if the other tokens are found.
8202  last_token = token;
8203  lexer.set_document_state(false);
8204  return;
8205  }
8206  }
8207  }
8208 
8213  void deserialize_node(lexer_type &lexer, const lexical_token &first_token, uint32_t first_line,
8214  uint32_t first_indent, lexical_token_t &last_type)
8215  {
8216  lexical_token token = first_token;
8217  uint32_t line = first_line;
8218  uint32_t indent = first_indent;
8219 
8220  do
8221  {
8222  switch (token.type)
8223  {
8224  case lexical_token_t::EXPLICIT_KEY_PREFIX: {
8225  const bool needs_to_move_back =
8226  indent == 0 || indent < m_context_stack.back().indent;
8227  if (needs_to_move_back)
8228  {
8229  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
8230  return c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING && indent == c.indent;
8231  });
8232  }
8233 
8234  switch (m_context_stack.back().state)
8235  {
8236  case context_state_t::MAPPING_VALUE:
8237  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY:
8238  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_VALUE:
8239  case context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY:
8240  // This path is needed in case the input contains nested explicit keys.
8241  // ```yaml
8242  // foo:
8243  // ? ? foo
8244  // : bar
8245  // : ? baz
8246  // : - ? qux
8247  // : 123
8248  // ```
8249  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8250  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8251  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
8252  mp_current_node);
8253  break;
8254  default:
8255  break;
8256  }
8257 
8258  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8259  if (token.type == lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_BLOCK_PREFIX)
8260  {
8261  // heap-allocated node will be freed in handling the corresponding KEY_SEPARATOR
8262  // event
8263  auto *p_node = new basic_node_type(node_type::SEQUENCE);
8264  m_context_stack.emplace_back(
8265  line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY, p_node);
8266 
8267  apply_directive_set(*p_node);
8268  parse_context context(lexer.get_lines_processed(),
8269  lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos(),
8270  context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE, p_node);
8271  m_context_stack.emplace_back(context);
8272 
8273  p_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().emplace_back(
8274  basic_node_type());
8275  mp_current_node = &(p_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8276  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8277  context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY;
8278  context.p_node = mp_current_node;
8279  m_context_stack.emplace_back(std::move(context));
8280 
8281  break;
8282  }
8283 
8284  // heap-allocated node will be freed in handling the corresponding KEY_SEPARATOR
8285  // event
8286  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent,
8287  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY,
8288  new basic_node_type());
8289  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8290  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8291  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8292  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8293 
8294  continue;
8295  }
8296  case lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR: {
8297  FK_YAML_ASSERT(!m_context_stack.empty());
8298  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_context_stack.back().state ==
8299  context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY)
8300  {
8301  // empty mapping keys are not supported.
8302  // ```yaml
8303  // - : foo
8304  // ```
8305  throw parse_error("sequence key should not be empty.", line, indent);
8306  }
8307 
8308  if (m_flow_context_depth > 0)
8309  {
8310  break;
8311  }
8312 
8313  // hold the line count of the key separator for later use.
8314  const uint32_t old_indent = indent;
8315  const uint32_t old_line = line;
8316 
8317  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8318  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8319  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8320 
8321  const bool found_props = deserialize_node_properties(lexer, token, line, indent);
8322  if (found_props && line == lexer.get_lines_processed())
8323  {
8324  // defer applying node properties for the subsequent node on the same line.
8325  continue;
8326  }
8327 
8328  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8329  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8330 
8331  const bool is_implicit_same_line =
8332  (line == old_line) &&
8333  (m_context_stack.empty() || old_indent > m_context_stack.back().indent);
8334  if (is_implicit_same_line)
8335  {
8336  // a key separator for an implicit key with its value on the same line.
8337  continue;
8338  }
8339 
8340  if (line > old_line)
8341  {
8342  if (m_needs_tag_impl)
8343  {
8344  const tag_t tag_type = tag_resolver_type::resolve_tag(m_tag_name, mp_meta);
8345  if (tag_type == tag_t::MAPPING || tag_type == tag_t::CUSTOM_TAG)
8346  {
8347  // set YAML node properties here to distinguish them from those for the
8348  // first key node as shown in the following snippet:
8349  //
8350  // ```yaml
8351  // foo: !!map
8352  // !!str 123: true
8353  // ^
8354  // this !!str tag overwrites the preceding !!map tag.
8355  // ```
8356  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8357  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8358  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8359  m_context_stack.emplace_back(
8360  line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING, mp_current_node);
8361  continue;
8362  }
8363  }
8364 
8365  if (token.type == lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_BLOCK_PREFIX)
8366  {
8367  // a key separator preceding block sequence entries
8368  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::sequence({basic_node_type()});
8369  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8370  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8371  auto &cur_context = m_context_stack.back();
8372  cur_context.line = line;
8373  cur_context.indent = indent;
8374  cur_context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE;
8375 
8376  mp_current_node =
8377  &(mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8378  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8379  parse_context entry_context = cur_context;
8380  entry_context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY;
8381  entry_context.p_node = mp_current_node;
8382  m_context_stack.emplace_back(std::move(entry_context));
8383 
8384  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8385  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8386  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8387 
8388  const bool has_props =
8389  deserialize_node_properties(lexer, token, line, indent);
8390  if (has_props)
8391  {
8392  const uint32_t line_after_props = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8393  if (line == line_after_props)
8394  {
8395  // Skip updating the current indent to avoid stacking a wrong
8396  // indentation.
8397  //
8398  // ```yaml
8399  // &foo bar: baz
8400  // ^
8401  // the correct indent width for the "bar" node key.
8402  // ```
8403  continue;
8404  }
8405 
8406  // if node properties and the followed node are on different lines
8407  // (i.e., the properties are for a container node), the application and
8408  // the line advancement must happen here. Otherwise, a false indent
8409  // error will be emitted. See
8410  // https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML/issues/368 for more details.
8411  line = line_after_props;
8412  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8413  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8414  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line_after_props, indent,
8415  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
8416  mp_current_node);
8417  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8418  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8419  }
8420 
8421  continue;
8422  }
8423 
8424  if (indent <= m_context_stack.back().indent)
8425  {
8426  FK_YAML_ASSERT(m_context_stack.back().state ==
8427  context_state_t::MAPPING_VALUE);
8428 
8429  // Mapping values can be omitted and are considered to be null.
8430  // ```yaml
8431  // foo:
8432  // bar:
8433  // baz:
8434  // qux:
8435  // # -> {foo: null, bar: {baz: null}, qux: null}
8436  // ```
8437  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
8438  return (c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING) &&
8439  (indent == c.indent);
8440  });
8441  }
8442 
8443  // defer checking the existence of a key separator after the following scalar
8444  // until the next deserialize_scalar() call.
8445  continue;
8446  }
8447 
8448  // handle explicit mapping key separators.
8449  FK_YAML_ASSERT(m_context_stack.back().state ==
8450  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY);
8451 
8452  basic_node_type key_node = std::move(*m_context_stack.back().p_node);
8453  m_context_stack.pop_back();
8454  m_context_stack.back().p_node->template get_value_ref<mapping_type &>().emplace(
8455  key_node, basic_node_type());
8456  mp_current_node = &(m_context_stack.back().p_node->operator[](std::move(key_node)));
8457  m_context_stack.emplace_back(old_line, old_indent,
8458  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_VALUE,
8459  mp_current_node);
8460 
8461  if (token.type == lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_BLOCK_PREFIX)
8462  {
8463  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::sequence({basic_node_type()});
8464  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8465  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8466  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE,
8467  mp_current_node);
8468 
8469  mp_current_node =
8470  &(mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8471  parse_context entry_context = m_context_stack.back();
8472  entry_context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY;
8473  entry_context.p_node = mp_current_node;
8474  m_context_stack.emplace_back(std::move(entry_context));
8475  break;
8476  }
8477 
8478  continue;
8479  }
8480  case lexical_token_t::ANCHOR_PREFIX:
8481  case lexical_token_t::TAG_PREFIX:
8482  deserialize_node_properties(lexer, token, line, indent);
8483  // Skip updating the current indent to avoid stacking a wrong indentation.
8484  // Note that node properties for block sequences as a mapping value are processed
8485  // when a `lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR` token is processed.
8486  //
8487  // ```yaml
8488  // &foo bar: baz
8489  // ^
8490  // the correct indent width for the "bar" node key.
8491  // ```
8492  continue;
8493  case lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_BLOCK_PREFIX: {
8494  FK_YAML_ASSERT(!m_context_stack.empty());
8495  const uint32_t parent_indent = m_context_stack.back().indent;
8496  if (indent == parent_indent)
8497  {
8498  // If the previous block sequence entry is empty, just move to the parent
8499  // context.
8500  // ```yaml
8501  // foo:
8502  // -
8503  // - bar
8504  // # ^ (here)
8505  // # -> {foo: [null, bar]}
8506  // ```
8507  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [](const parse_context &c) {
8508  return c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE;
8509  });
8510  }
8511  else if (indent < parent_indent)
8512  {
8513  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
8514  return c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE && indent == c.indent;
8515  });
8516  }
8517  else /*parent_indent < indent*/
8518  {
8519  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_context_stack.back().state ==
8520  context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE)
8521  {
8522  // bad indentation like the following YAML:
8523  // ```yaml
8524  // - "foo"
8525  // - bar
8526  // # ^
8527  // ```
8528  throw parse_error("bad indentation of a mapping entry.", line, indent);
8529  }
8530 
8531  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::sequence();
8532  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE,
8533  mp_current_node);
8534  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8535  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8536  }
8537 
8538  auto &seq = mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>();
8539  seq.emplace_back(basic_node_type());
8540  mp_current_node = &(seq.back());
8541  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8542  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY,
8543  mp_current_node);
8544  break;
8545  }
8546  case lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_FLOW_BEGIN:
8547  if (m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8548  {
8549  lexer.set_context_state(true);
8550 
8551  if (indent <= m_context_stack.back().indent)
8552  {
8553  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
8554  switch (c.state)
8555  {
8556  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING:
8557  case context_state_t::MAPPING_VALUE:
8558  return indent == c.indent;
8559  default:
8560  return false;
8561  }
8562  });
8563  }
8564  }
8565  else if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_token_state ==
8566  flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX)
8567  {
8568  throw parse_error(
8569  "Flow sequence beginning is found without separated with a comma.", line,
8570  indent);
8571  }
8572 
8573  ++m_flow_context_depth;
8574 
8575  switch (m_context_stack.back().state)
8576  {
8577  case context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE:
8578  case context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE:
8579  mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().emplace_back(
8580  basic_node_type::sequence());
8581  mp_current_node =
8582  &(mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8583  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE,
8584  mp_current_node);
8585  break;
8586  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING:
8587  case context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING:
8588  // heap-allocated node will be freed in handling the corresponding
8589  // SEQUENCE_FLOW_END event.
8590  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE_KEY,
8591  new basic_node_type(node_type::SEQUENCE));
8592  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8593  break;
8594  default: {
8595  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::sequence();
8596  parse_context &last_context = m_context_stack.back();
8597  last_context.line = line;
8598  last_context.indent = indent;
8599  last_context.state = context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE;
8600  break;
8601  }
8602  }
8603 
8604  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8605  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8606 
8607  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8608  break;
8609  case lexical_token_t::SEQUENCE_FLOW_END: {
8610  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8611  {
8612  throw parse_error("Flow sequence ending is found outside the flow context.",
8613  line, indent);
8614  }
8615 
8616  if (--m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8617  {
8618  lexer.set_context_state(false);
8619  }
8620 
8621  // find the corresponding flow sequence beginning.
8622  auto itr = std::find_if( // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8623  m_context_stack.rbegin(), m_context_stack.rend(), [](const parse_context &c) {
8624  switch (c.state)
8625  {
8626  case context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE_KEY:
8627  case context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE:
8628  return true;
8629  default:
8630  return false;
8631  }
8632  });
8633 
8634  const bool is_valid = itr != m_context_stack.rend();
8635  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_valid)
8636  {
8637  throw parse_error("No corresponding flow sequence beginning is found.", line,
8638  indent);
8639  }
8640 
8641  // keep the last state for later processing.
8642  parse_context &last_context = m_context_stack.back();
8643  mp_current_node = last_context.p_node;
8644  last_context.p_node = nullptr;
8645  indent = last_context.indent;
8646  const context_state_t state = last_context.state;
8647  m_context_stack.pop_back();
8648 
8649  // handle cases where the flow sequence is a mapping key node.
8650 
8651  if (!m_context_stack.empty() && state == context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE_KEY)
8652  {
8653  basic_node_type key_node = std::move(*mp_current_node);
8654  delete mp_current_node;
8655  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8656  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8657 
8658  add_new_key(std::move(key_node), line, indent);
8659  break;
8660  }
8661 
8662  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8663  if (token.type == lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR)
8664  {
8665  basic_node_type key_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8666  apply_directive_set(key_node);
8667  mp_current_node->swap(key_node);
8668 
8669  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
8670  mp_current_node);
8671  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8672 
8673  add_new_key(std::move(key_node), line, indent);
8674  }
8675  else
8676  {
8677  if (!m_context_stack.empty())
8678  {
8679  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8680  }
8681  if (m_flow_context_depth > 0)
8682  {
8683  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX;
8684  }
8685  }
8686 
8687  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8688  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8689  continue;
8690  }
8691  case lexical_token_t::MAPPING_FLOW_BEGIN:
8692  if (m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8693  {
8694  lexer.set_context_state(true);
8695 
8696  if (indent <= m_context_stack.back().indent)
8697  {
8698  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
8699  switch (c.state)
8700  {
8701  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING:
8702  case context_state_t::MAPPING_VALUE:
8703  return indent == c.indent;
8704  default:
8705  return false;
8706  }
8707  });
8708  }
8709  }
8710  else if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_token_state ==
8711  flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX)
8712  {
8713  throw parse_error(
8714  "Flow mapping beginning is found without separated with a comma.", line,
8715  indent);
8716  }
8717 
8718  ++m_flow_context_depth;
8719 
8720  switch (m_context_stack.back().state)
8721  {
8722  case context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE:
8723  case context_state_t::FLOW_SEQUENCE:
8724  mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().emplace_back(
8725  basic_node_type::mapping());
8726  mp_current_node =
8727  &(mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().back());
8728  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING,
8729  mp_current_node);
8730  break;
8731  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING:
8732  case context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING:
8733  // heap-allocated node will be freed in handling the corresponding
8734  // MAPPING_FLOW_END event.
8735  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING_KEY,
8736  new basic_node_type(node_type::MAPPING));
8737  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8738  break;
8739  default: {
8740  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8741  parse_context &last_context = m_context_stack.back();
8742  last_context.line = line;
8743  last_context.indent = indent;
8744  last_context.state = context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING;
8745  break;
8746  }
8747  }
8748 
8749  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
8750  apply_node_properties(*mp_current_node);
8751 
8752  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8753  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8754 
8755  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8756  break;
8757  case lexical_token_t::MAPPING_FLOW_END: {
8758  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8759  {
8760  throw parse_error("Flow mapping ending is found outside the flow context.",
8761  line, indent);
8762  }
8763 
8764  if (--m_flow_context_depth == 0)
8765  {
8766  lexer.set_context_state(false);
8767  }
8768 
8769  // find the corresponding flow mapping beginning.
8770  auto itr = std::find_if( // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8771  m_context_stack.rbegin(), m_context_stack.rend(), [](const parse_context &c) {
8772  switch (c.state)
8773  {
8774  case context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING_KEY:
8775  case context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING:
8776  return true;
8777  default:
8778  return false;
8779  }
8780  });
8781 
8782  const bool is_valid = itr != m_context_stack.rend();
8783  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_valid)
8784  {
8785  throw parse_error("No corresponding flow mapping beginning is found.", line,
8786  indent);
8787  }
8788 
8789  // keep the last state for later processing.
8790  parse_context &last_context = m_context_stack.back();
8791  mp_current_node = last_context.p_node;
8792  last_context.p_node = nullptr;
8793  indent = last_context.indent;
8794  const context_state_t state = last_context.state;
8795  m_context_stack.pop_back();
8796 
8797  // handle cases where the flow mapping is a mapping key node.
8798 
8799  if (!m_context_stack.empty() && state == context_state_t::FLOW_MAPPING_KEY)
8800  {
8801  basic_node_type key_node = std::move(*mp_current_node);
8802  delete mp_current_node;
8803  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8804  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8805 
8806  add_new_key(std::move(key_node), line, indent);
8807  break;
8808  }
8809 
8810  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8811  if (token.type == lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR)
8812  {
8813  basic_node_type key_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
8814  apply_directive_set(key_node);
8815  mp_current_node->swap(key_node);
8816 
8817  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
8818  mp_current_node);
8819  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8820 
8821  add_new_key(std::move(key_node), line, indent);
8822  }
8823  else
8824  {
8825  if (!m_context_stack.empty())
8826  {
8827  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
8828  }
8829  if (m_flow_context_depth > 0)
8830  {
8831  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX;
8832  }
8833  }
8834 
8835  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8836  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8837  continue;
8838  }
8839  case lexical_token_t::VALUE_SEPARATOR:
8840  FK_YAML_ASSERT(m_flow_context_depth > 0);
8841  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_token_state !=
8842  flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX)
8843  {
8844  throw parse_error("invalid value separator is found.", line, indent);
8845  }
8846  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX;
8847  break;
8848  case lexical_token_t::ALIAS_PREFIX: {
8849  // An alias node must not specify any properties (tag, anchor).
8850  // https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/#71-alias-nodes
8851  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_needs_tag_impl)
8852  {
8853  throw parse_error("Tag cannot be specified to an alias node", line, indent);
8854  }
8855  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_needs_anchor_impl)
8856  {
8857  throw parse_error("Anchor cannot be specified to an alias node.", line, indent);
8858  }
8859 
8860  std::string token_str = std::string(token.str.begin(), token.str.end());
8861 
8862  const auto anchor_counts =
8863  static_cast<uint32_t>(mp_meta->anchor_table.count(token_str));
8864  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (anchor_counts == 0)
8865  {
8866  throw parse_error("The given anchor name must appear prior to the alias node.",
8867  line, indent);
8868  }
8869 
8870  basic_node_type node{};
8871  node.m_attrs |= detail::node_attr_bits::alias_bit;
8872  node.m_prop.anchor = std::move(token_str);
8873  detail::node_attr_bits::set_anchor_offset(anchor_counts - 1, node.m_attrs);
8874 
8875  apply_directive_set(node);
8876  apply_node_properties(node);
8877 
8878  deserialize_scalar(lexer, std::move(node), indent, line, token);
8879  continue;
8880  }
8881  case lexical_token_t::PLAIN_SCALAR:
8882  case lexical_token_t::SINGLE_QUOTED_SCALAR:
8883  case lexical_token_t::DOUBLE_QUOTED_SCALAR: {
8884  tag_t tag_type{tag_t::NONE};
8885  if (m_needs_tag_impl)
8886  {
8887  tag_type = tag_resolver_type::resolve_tag(m_tag_name, mp_meta);
8888  }
8889 
8890  basic_node_type node =
8891  scalar_parser_type(line, indent).parse_flow(token.type, tag_type, token.str);
8892  apply_directive_set(node);
8893  apply_node_properties(node);
8894 
8895  deserialize_scalar(lexer, std::move(node), indent, line, token);
8896  continue;
8897  }
8898  case lexical_token_t::BLOCK_LITERAL_SCALAR:
8899  case lexical_token_t::BLOCK_FOLDED_SCALAR: {
8900  tag_t tag_type{tag_t::NONE};
8901  if (m_needs_tag_impl)
8902  {
8903  tag_type = tag_resolver_type::resolve_tag(m_tag_name, mp_meta);
8904  }
8905 
8906  basic_node_type node = scalar_parser_type(line, indent)
8907  .parse_block(token.type, tag_type, token.str,
8908  lexer.get_block_scalar_header());
8909  apply_directive_set(node);
8910  apply_node_properties(node);
8911 
8912  deserialize_scalar(lexer, std::move(node), indent, line, token);
8913  continue;
8914  }
8915  // these tokens end parsing the current YAML document.
8916  case lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER: // This handles an empty input.
8917  case lexical_token_t::END_OF_DIRECTIVES:
8918  case lexical_token_t::END_OF_DOCUMENT:
8919  last_type = token.type;
8920  return;
8921  // no way to come here while lexically analyzing document contents.
8922  case lexical_token_t::YAML_VER_DIRECTIVE: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8923  case lexical_token_t::TAG_DIRECTIVE: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8924  case lexical_token_t::INVALID_DIRECTIVE: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8925  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
8926  }
8927 
8928  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8929  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8930  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8931  } while (token.type != lexical_token_t::END_OF_BUFFER);
8932 
8933  last_type = token.type;
8934  }
8935 
8944  bool deserialize_node_properties(lexer_type &lexer, lexical_token &last_token, uint32_t &line,
8945  uint32_t &indent)
8946  {
8947  m_needs_anchor_impl = m_needs_tag_impl = false;
8948 
8949  lexical_token token = last_token;
8950  bool ends_loop{false};
8951  do
8952  {
8953  if (line < lexer.get_lines_processed())
8954  {
8955  break;
8956  }
8957 
8958  switch (token.type)
8959  {
8960  case lexical_token_t::ANCHOR_PREFIX:
8961  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_needs_anchor_impl)
8962  {
8963  throw parse_error(
8964  "anchor name cannot be specified more than once to the same node.",
8965  lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8966  }
8967 
8968  m_anchor_name.assign(token.str.begin(), token.str.end());
8969  m_needs_anchor_impl = true;
8970 
8971  if (!m_needs_tag_impl)
8972  {
8973  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8974  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8975  }
8976 
8977  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8978  break;
8979  case lexical_token_t::TAG_PREFIX: {
8980  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_needs_tag_impl)
8981  {
8982  throw parse_error(
8983  "tag name cannot be specified more than once to the same node.",
8984  lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
8985  }
8986 
8987  m_tag_name.assign(token.str.begin(), token.str.end());
8988  m_needs_tag_impl = true;
8989 
8990  if (!m_needs_anchor_impl)
8991  {
8992  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
8993  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
8994  }
8995 
8996  token = lexer.get_next_token();
8997  break;
8998  }
8999  default:
9000  ends_loop = true;
9001  break;
9002  }
9003  } while (!ends_loop);
9004 
9005  last_token = token;
9006  const bool prop_specified = m_needs_anchor_impl || m_needs_tag_impl;
9007  if (!prop_specified)
9008  {
9009  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
9010  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
9011  }
9012 
9013  return prop_specified;
9014  }
9015 
9020  void add_new_key(basic_node_type &&key, const uint32_t line, const uint32_t indent)
9021  {
9022  if (m_flow_context_depth == 0)
9023  {
9024  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_context_stack.back().indent < indent)
9025  {
9026  // bad indentation like the following YAML:
9027  // ```yaml
9028  // foo: true
9029  // baz: 123
9030  // # ^
9031  // ```
9032  throw parse_error("bad indentation of a mapping entry.", line, indent);
9033  }
9034 
9035  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
9036  return (c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING) && (indent == c.indent);
9037  });
9038  }
9039  else
9040  {
9041  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_token_state != flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX)
9042  {
9043  throw parse_error("Flow mapping entry is found without separated with a comma.",
9044  line, indent);
9045  }
9046 
9047  if (mp_current_node->is_sequence())
9048  {
9049  mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().emplace_back(
9050  basic_node_type::mapping());
9051  mp_current_node = &(mp_current_node->operator[](mp_current_node->size() - 1));
9052  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
9053  mp_current_node);
9054  }
9055  }
9056 
9057  auto itr = mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<mapping_type &>().emplace(
9058  std::move(key), basic_node_type());
9059  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!itr.second)
9060  {
9061  throw parse_error("Detected duplication in mapping keys.", line, indent);
9062  }
9063 
9064  mp_current_node = &(itr.first->second);
9065  const parse_context &key_context = m_context_stack.back();
9066  m_context_stack.emplace_back(key_context.line, key_context.indent,
9067  context_state_t::MAPPING_VALUE, mp_current_node);
9068  }
9069 
9072  void assign_node_value(basic_node_type &&node_value, const uint32_t line, const uint32_t indent)
9073  {
9074  if (mp_current_node->is_sequence())
9075  {
9076  FK_YAML_ASSERT(m_flow_context_depth > 0);
9077 
9078  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_flow_token_state != flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX)
9079  {
9080  // Flow sequence entries are not allowed to be empty.
9081  // ```yaml
9082  // [foo,,bar]
9083  // ```
9084  throw parse_error("flow sequence entry is found without separated with a comma.",
9085  line, indent);
9086  }
9087 
9088  mp_current_node->template get_value_ref<sequence_type &>().emplace_back(
9089  std::move(node_value));
9090  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX;
9091  return;
9092  }
9093 
9094  // a scalar node
9095  *mp_current_node = std::move(node_value);
9096  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (m_context_stack.empty())
9097  {
9098  // single scalar document.
9099  return;
9100  }
9101 
9102  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_context_stack.back().state !=
9103  context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY)
9104  {
9105  m_context_stack.pop_back();
9106  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
9107 
9108  if (m_flow_context_depth > 0)
9109  {
9110  m_flow_token_state = flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_SEPARATOR_OR_SUFFIX;
9111  }
9112  }
9113  }
9114 
9122  void deserialize_scalar(lexer_type &lexer, basic_node_type &&node, uint32_t &indent,
9123  uint32_t &line, lexical_token &token)
9124  {
9125  token = lexer.get_next_token();
9126  if (mp_current_node->is_mapping())
9127  {
9128  const bool is_key_sep_followed = (token.type == lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR) &&
9129  (line == lexer.get_lines_processed());
9130  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_key_sep_followed)
9131  {
9132  throw parse_error(
9133  "The \":\" mapping value indicator must be followed after a mapping key.",
9134  lexer.get_lines_processed(), lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos());
9135  }
9136  add_new_key(std::move(node), line, indent);
9137  }
9138  else if (token.type == lexical_token_t::KEY_SEPARATOR)
9139  {
9140  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (line != lexer.get_lines_processed())
9141  {
9142  // This path is for explicit mapping key separator like:
9143  // ```yaml
9144  // ? foo
9145  // : bar
9146  // # ^ this separator
9147  // ```
9148  assign_node_value(std::move(node), line, indent);
9149  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
9150  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
9151 
9152  if (m_context_stack.back().state != context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY)
9153  {
9154  pop_to_parent_node(line, indent, [indent](const parse_context &c) {
9155  return c.state == context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY &&
9156  indent == c.indent;
9157  });
9158  }
9159  return;
9160  }
9161 
9162  if (mp_current_node->is_scalar())
9163  {
9164  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (!m_context_stack.empty())
9165  {
9166  parse_context &cur_context = m_context_stack.back();
9167  switch (cur_context.state)
9168  {
9169  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_KEY:
9170  case context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING_EXPLICIT_VALUE:
9171  case context_state_t::BLOCK_SEQUENCE_ENTRY:
9172  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
9173  mp_current_node);
9174  break;
9175  default:
9176  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (cur_context.line == line)
9177  {
9178  throw parse_error(
9179  "Multiple mapping keys are specified on the same line.", line,
9180  indent);
9181  }
9182  cur_context.line = line;
9183  cur_context.indent = indent;
9184  cur_context.state = context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING;
9185  break;
9186  }
9187 
9188  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
9189  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
9190  }
9191  else
9192  {
9193  // root mapping node
9194 
9195  m_context_stack.emplace_back(line, indent, context_state_t::BLOCK_MAPPING,
9196  mp_current_node);
9197  *mp_current_node = basic_node_type::mapping();
9198  apply_directive_set(*mp_current_node);
9199 
9200  // apply node properties if any to the root mapping node.
9201  if (!m_root_anchor_name.empty())
9202  {
9203  mp_current_node->add_anchor_name(std::move(m_root_anchor_name));
9204  m_root_anchor_name.clear();
9205  }
9206  if (!m_root_tag_name.empty())
9207  {
9208  mp_current_node->add_tag_name(std::move(m_root_tag_name));
9209  m_root_tag_name.clear();
9210  }
9211  }
9212  }
9213  add_new_key(std::move(node), line, indent);
9214  }
9215  else
9216  {
9217  assign_node_value(std::move(node), line, indent);
9218  }
9219 
9220  indent = lexer.get_last_token_begin_pos();
9221  line = lexer.get_lines_processed();
9222  }
9223 
9228  template <typename Pred> void pop_to_parent_node(uint32_t line, uint32_t indent, Pred &&pred)
9229  {
9230  FK_YAML_ASSERT(!m_context_stack.empty());
9231 
9232  // LCOV_EXCL_START
9233  auto itr = std::find_if(m_context_stack.rbegin(), m_context_stack.rend(),
9234  std::forward<Pred>(pred));
9235  // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
9236  const bool is_indent_valid = (itr != m_context_stack.rend());
9237  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_indent_valid)
9238  {
9239  throw parse_error("Detected invalid indentation.", line, indent);
9240  }
9241 
9242  const auto pop_num = static_cast<uint32_t>(std::distance(m_context_stack.rbegin(), itr));
9243 
9244  // move back to the parent block mapping.
9245  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < pop_num; i++)
9246  {
9247  m_context_stack.pop_back();
9248  }
9249  mp_current_node = m_context_stack.back().p_node;
9250  }
9251 
9254  void apply_directive_set(basic_node_type &node) noexcept
9255  {
9256  node.mp_meta = mp_meta;
9257  }
9258 
9261  void apply_node_properties(basic_node_type &node)
9262  {
9263  if (m_needs_anchor_impl)
9264  {
9265  node.add_anchor_name(m_anchor_name);
9266  m_needs_anchor_impl = false;
9267  m_anchor_name.clear();
9268  }
9269 
9270  if (m_needs_tag_impl)
9271  {
9272  node.add_tag_name(m_tag_name);
9273  m_needs_tag_impl = false;
9274  m_tag_name.clear();
9275  }
9276  }
9277 
9280  yaml_version_type convert_yaml_version(str_view version_str) noexcept
9281  {
9282  return (version_str.compare("1.1") == 0) ? yaml_version_type::VERSION_1_1
9283  : yaml_version_type::VERSION_1_2;
9284  }
9285 
9286  private:
9288  basic_node_type *mp_current_node{nullptr};
9290  std::deque<parse_context> m_context_stack{};
9292  uint32_t m_flow_context_depth{0};
9294  std::shared_ptr<doc_metainfo_type> mp_meta{};
9296  bool m_needs_anchor_impl{false};
9298  bool m_needs_tag_impl{false};
9300  flow_token_state_t m_flow_token_state{flow_token_state_t::NEEDS_VALUE_OR_SUFFIX};
9302  std::string m_anchor_name;
9304  std::string m_tag_name;
9306  std::string m_root_anchor_name;
9308  std::string m_root_tag_name;
9309 };
9310 
9311 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
9312 
9313 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_DESERIALIZER_HPP */
9314 
9315 // #include <fkYAML/detail/input/input_adapter.hpp>
9316 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
9317 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
9318 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
9319 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
9320 //
9321 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
9322 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
9323 
9324 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_INPUT_ADAPTER_HPP
9325 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_INPUT_INPUT_ADAPTER_HPP
9326 
9327 #include <array>
9328 #include <cstdio>
9329 #include <cstring>
9330 #include <istream>
9331 #include <iterator>
9332 #include <string>
9333 
9334 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
9335 
9336 // #include <fkYAML/detail/assert.hpp>
9337 
9338 // #include <fkYAML/detail/encodings/utf_encode_detector.hpp>
9339 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
9340 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
9341 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
9342 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
9343 //
9344 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
9345 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
9346 
9347 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_ENCODINGS_UTF_ENCODE_DETECTOR_HPP
9348 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_ENCODINGS_UTF_ENCODE_DETECTOR_HPP
9349 
9350 #include <cstdint>
9351 #include <istream>
9352 
9353 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
9354 
9355 // #include <fkYAML/detail/encodings/utf_encode_t.hpp>
9356 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
9357 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
9358 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
9359 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
9360 //
9361 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
9362 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
9363 
9364 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_ENCODINGS_UTF_ENCODE_T_HPP
9365 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_ENCODINGS_UTF_ENCODE_T_HPP
9366 
9367 #include <cstdint>
9368 
9369 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
9370 
9371 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
9372 
9376 enum class utf_encode_t : std::uint8_t
9377 {
9378  UTF_8,
9379  UTF_16BE,
9380  UTF_16LE,
9381  UTF_32BE,
9382  UTF_32LE,
9383 };
9384 
9385 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
9386 
9387 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_ENCODINGS_UTF_ENCODE_T_HPP */
9388 
9389 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/stl_supplement.hpp>
9390 
9391 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/type_traits.hpp>
9392 
9393 // #include <fkYAML/exception.hpp>
9394 
9395 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
9396 
9402 inline utf_encode_t detect_encoding_type(const std::array<uint8_t, 4> &bytes,
9403  bool &has_bom) noexcept
9404 {
9405  has_bom = false;
9406 
9407  const uint8_t byte0 = bytes[0];
9408  const uint8_t byte1 = bytes[1];
9409  const uint8_t byte2 = bytes[2];
9410  const uint8_t byte3 = bytes[3];
9411 
9412  // Check if a BOM exists.
9413 
9414  if (byte0 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xEFu) && byte1 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xBBu) &&
9415  byte2 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xBFu))
9416  {
9417  has_bom = true;
9418  return utf_encode_t::UTF_8;
9419  }
9420 
9421  if (byte0 == 0 && byte1 == 0 && byte2 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFEu) &&
9422  byte3 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFFu))
9423  {
9424  has_bom = true;
9425  return utf_encode_t::UTF_32BE;
9426  }
9427 
9428  if (byte0 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFFu) && byte1 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFEu) &&
9429  byte2 == 0 && byte3 == 0)
9430  {
9431  has_bom = true;
9432  return utf_encode_t::UTF_32LE;
9433  }
9434 
9435  if (byte0 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFEu) && byte1 == static_cast<uint8_t>(0xFFu))
9436  {
9437  has_bom = true;
9438  return utf_encode_t::UTF_16BE;
