12465  throw type_error("The target node value type is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12466  }
12467 
12468  // call get_value_inplace(), not get_value(), since the storage to fill the result into is
12469  // already created.
12470  for (std::size_t i0 = 0; i0 < N0; i0++)
12471  {
12472  for (std::size_t i1 = 0; i1 < N1; i1++)
12473  {
12474  for (std::size_t i2 = 0; i2 < N2; i2++)
12475  {
12476  n.at(i0).at(i1).at(i2).get_value_inplace(array[i0][i1][i2]);
12477  }
12478  }
12479  }
12480 }
12481 
12490 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T, std::size_t N>
12491 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::array<T, N> &arr)
12492  -> decltype(n.get_value_inplace(std::declval<T &>()), void())
12493 {
12494  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12495  {
12496  throw type_error("The target node value type is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12497  }
12498 
12499  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; i++)
12500  {
12501  // call get_value_inplace(), not get_value(), since the storage to fill the result into is
12502  // already created.
12503  n.at(i).get_value_inplace(arr.at(i));
12504  }
12505 }
12506 
12514 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T>
12515 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::valarray<T> &va)
12516  -> decltype(n.get_value_inplace(std::declval<T &>()), void())
12517 {
12518  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12519  {
12520  throw type_error("The target node value type is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12521  }
12522 
12523  std::size_t count = n.size();
12524  va.resize(count);
12525  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
12526  {
12527  // call get_value_inplace(), not get_value(), since the storage to fill the result into is
12528  // already created.
12529  n.at(i).get_value_inplace(va[i]);
12530  }
12531 }
12532 
12541 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T, typename Alloc>
12542 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::forward_list<T, Alloc> &fl)
12543  -> decltype(n.template get_value<T>(), void())
12544 {
12545  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12546  {
12547  throw type_error("The target node value is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12548  }
12549 
12550  fl.clear();
12551 
12552  // std::forward_list does not have insert function.
12553  auto insert_pos_itr = fl.before_begin();
12554  for (const auto &elem : n)
12555  {
12556  insert_pos_itr = fl.emplace_after(insert_pos_itr, elem.template get_value<T>());
12557  }
12558 }
12559 
12566 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename CompatSeqType,
12567  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
12568  is_constructible_sequence_type<BasicNodeType, CompatSeqType>,
12569  negation<std::is_constructible<
12570  typename BasicNodeType::string_type, CompatSeqType>>>::value,
12571  int> = 0>
12572 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, CompatSeqType &s)
12573  -> decltype(n.template get_value<typename CompatSeqType::value_type>(), void())
12574 {
12575  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12576  {
12577  throw type_error("The target node value is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12578  }
12579 
12580  s.clear();
12581 
12582  // call reserve function first if it's available (like std::vector).
12583  call_reserve_if_available<CompatSeqType>::call(s, n.size());
12584 
12585  // transform a sequence node into a destination type object by calling insert function.
12586  using std::end;
12587  std::transform(n.begin(), n.end(), std::inserter(s, end(s)), [](const BasicNodeType &elem) {
12588  return elem.template get_value<typename CompatSeqType::value_type>();
12589  });
12590 }
12591 
12599 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename SeqContainerAdapter,
12600  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
12601  is_sequence_container_adapter<SeqContainerAdapter>>::value,
12602  int> = 0>
12603 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, SeqContainerAdapter &ca)
12604  -> decltype(n.template get_value<typename SeqContainerAdapter::value_type>(),
12605  ca.push(std::declval<typename SeqContainerAdapter::value_type>()), void())
12606 {
12607  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12608  {
12609  throw type_error("The target node value is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12610  }
12611 
12612  // clear existing elements manually since clear function is not implemeneted for container
12613  // adapter classes.
12614  while (!ca.empty())
12615  {
12616  ca.pop();
12617  }
12618 
12619  for (const auto &elem : n)
12620  {
12621  // container adapter classes commonly have push function.
12622  // emplace function cannot be used in case SeqContainerAdapter::container_type is
12623  // std::vector<bool> in C++11.
12624  ca.push(elem.template get_value<typename SeqContainerAdapter::value_type>());
12625  }
12626 }
12627 
12636 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename CompatMapType,
12637  enable_if_t<is_constructible_mapping_type<CompatMapType>::value, int> = 0>
12638 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, CompatMapType &m)
12639  -> decltype(std::declval<const BasicNodeType &>()
12640  .template get_value<typename CompatMapType::key_type>(),
12641  std::declval<const BasicNodeType &>()
12642  .template get_value<typename CompatMapType::mapped_type>(),
12643  m.emplace(std::declval<typename CompatMapType::key_type>(),
12644  std::declval<typename CompatMapType::mapped_type>()),
12645  void())
12646 {
12647  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_mapping())
12648  {
12649  throw type_error("The target node value type is not mapping type.", n.get_type());
12650  }
12651 
12652  m.clear();
12653  call_reserve_if_available<CompatMapType>::call(m, n.size());
12654 
12655  for (const auto &pair :
12656  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type &>())
12657  {
12658  m.emplace(pair.first.template get_value<typename CompatMapType::key_type>(),
12659  pair.second.template get_value<typename CompatMapType::mapped_type>());
12660  }
12661 }
12662 
12667 template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
12668 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::nullptr_t &null)
12669 {
12670  // to ensure the target node value type is null.
12671  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_null())
12672  {
12673  throw type_error("The target node value type is not null type.", n.get_type());
12674  }
12675  null = nullptr;
12676 }
12677 
12682 template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
12683 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, bool &b)
12684 {
12685  switch (n.get_type())
12686  {
12687  case node_type::NULL_OBJECT:
12688  // nullptr is converted to false just as C++ implicitly does.
12689  b = false;
12690  break;
12691  case node_type::BOOLEAN:
12692  b = static_cast<bool>(
12693  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::boolean_type &>());
12694  break;
12695  case node_type::INTEGER:
12696  // true: non-zero, false: zero
12697  b = (n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::integer_type &>() != 0);
12698  break;
12699  case node_type::FLOAT:
12700  // true: non-zero, false: zero
12701  using float_type = typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type;
12702  b = (n.template get_value_ref<const float_type &>() != static_cast<float_type>(0.));
12703  break;
12704  case node_type::SEQUENCE:
12705  case node_type::MAPPING:
12706  case node_type::STRING:
12707  default:
12708  throw type_error("The target node value type is not compatible with boolean type.",
12709  n.get_type());
12710  }
12711 }
12712 
12716 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename IntType,
12717  bool = std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::integer_type, IntType>::value>
12718 struct from_node_int_helper
12719 {
12723  static IntType convert(const BasicNodeType &n)
12724  {
12725  return n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::integer_type &>();
12726  }
12727 };
12728 
12732 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename IntType>
12733 struct from_node_int_helper<BasicNodeType, IntType, false>
12734 {
12738  static IntType convert(const BasicNodeType &n)
12739  {
12740  using node_int_type = typename BasicNodeType::integer_type;
12741  const node_int_type tmp_int = n.template get_value_ref<const node_int_type &>();
12742 
12743  // under/overflow check.
12744  if (std::is_same<IntType, uint64_t>::value)
12745  {
12746  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tmp_int < 0)
12747  {
12748  throw exception("Integer value underflow detected.");
12749  }
12750  }
12751  else
12752  {
12753  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tmp_int <
12754  static_cast<node_int_type>(std::numeric_limits<IntType>::min()))
12755  {
12756  throw exception("Integer value underflow detected.");
12757  }
12758  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (static_cast<node_int_type>(std::numeric_limits<IntType>::max()) <
12759  tmp_int)
12760  {
12761  throw exception("Integer value overflow detected.");
12762  }
12763  }
12764 
12765  return static_cast<IntType>(tmp_int);
12766  }
12767 };
12768 
12776 template <
12777  typename BasicNodeType, typename IntegerType,
12778  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>, is_non_bool_integral<IntegerType>>::value,
12779  int> = 0>
12780 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, IntegerType &i)
12781 {
12782  switch (n.get_type())
12783  {
12784  case node_type::NULL_OBJECT:
12785  // nullptr is interpreted as 0
12786  i = static_cast<IntegerType>(0);
12787  break;
12788  case node_type::BOOLEAN:
12789  i = static_cast<bool>(
12790  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::boolean_type &>())
12791  ? static_cast<IntegerType>(1)
12792  : static_cast<IntegerType>(0);
12793  break;
12794  case node_type::INTEGER:
12795  i = from_node_int_helper<BasicNodeType, IntegerType>::convert(n);
12796  break;
12797  case node_type::FLOAT: {
12798  // int64_t should be safe to express integer part values of possible floating point types.
12799  const auto tmp_int = static_cast<int64_t>(
12800  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type &>());
12801 
12802  // under/overflow check.
12803  if (std::is_same<IntegerType, uint64_t>::value)
12804  {
12805  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tmp_int < 0)
12806  {
12807  throw exception("Integer value underflow detected.");
12808  }
12809  }
12810  else
12811  {
12812  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tmp_int <
12813  static_cast<int64_t>(std::numeric_limits<IntegerType>::min()))
12814  {
12815  throw exception("Integer value underflow detected.");
12816  }
12817  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (static_cast<int64_t>(std::numeric_limits<IntegerType>::max()) <
12818  tmp_int)
12819  {
12820  throw exception("Integer value overflow detected.");
12821  }
12822  }
12823 
12824  i = static_cast<IntegerType>(tmp_int);
12825  break;
12826  }
12827  case node_type::SEQUENCE:
12828  case node_type::MAPPING:
12829  case node_type::STRING:
12830  default:
12831  throw type_error("The target node value type is not compatible with integer type.",
12832  n.get_type());
12833  }
12834 }
12835 
12841 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename FloatType,
12842  bool = std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type, FloatType>::value>
12843 struct from_node_float_helper
12844 {
12848  static FloatType convert(const BasicNodeType &n)
12849  {
12850  return n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type &>();
12851  }
12852 };
12853 
12859 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename FloatType>
12860 struct from_node_float_helper<BasicNodeType, FloatType, false>
12861 {
12865  static FloatType convert(const BasicNodeType &n)
12866  {
12867  using node_float_type = typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type;
12868  auto tmp_float = n.template get_value_ref<const node_float_type &>();
12869 
12870  // check if the value is an infinite number (either positive or negative)
12871  if (std::isinf(tmp_float))
12872  {
12873  if (tmp_float == std::numeric_limits<node_float_type>::infinity())
12874  {
12875  return std::numeric_limits<FloatType>::infinity();
12876  }
12877 
12878  return static_cast<FloatType>(-1.) * std::numeric_limits<FloatType>::infinity();
12879  }
12880 
12881  // check if the value is not a number
12882  if (std::isnan(tmp_float))
12883  {
12884  return std::numeric_limits<FloatType>::quiet_NaN();
12885  }
12886 
12887  // check if the value is expressible as FloatType.
12888  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (tmp_float < std::numeric_limits<FloatType>::lowest())
12889  {
12890  throw exception("Floating point value underflow detected.");
12891  }
12892  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (std::numeric_limits<FloatType>::max() < tmp_float)
12893  {
12894  throw exception("Floating point value overflow detected.");
12895  }
12896 
12897  return static_cast<FloatType>(tmp_float);
12898  }
12899 };
12900 
12908 template <
12909  typename BasicNodeType, typename FloatType,
12910  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>, std::is_floating_point<FloatType>>::value,
12911  int> = 0>
12912 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, FloatType &f)
12913 {
12914  switch (n.get_type())
12915  {
12916  case node_type::NULL_OBJECT:
12917  // nullptr is interpreted as 0.0
12918  f = static_cast<FloatType>(0.);
12919  break;
12920  case node_type::BOOLEAN:
12921  f = static_cast<bool>(
12922  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::boolean_type &>())
12923  ? static_cast<FloatType>(1.)
12924  : static_cast<FloatType>(0.);
12925  break;
12926  case node_type::INTEGER:
12927  f = static_cast<FloatType>(
12928  n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::integer_type &>());
12929  break;
12930  case node_type::FLOAT:
12931  f = from_node_float_helper<BasicNodeType, FloatType>::convert(n);
12932  break;
12933  case node_type::SEQUENCE:
12934  case node_type::MAPPING:
12935  case node_type::STRING:
12936  default:
12937  throw type_error("The target node value type is not compatible with float number type.",
12938  n.get_type());
12939  }
12940 }
12941 
12946 template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
12947 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::string_type &s)
12948 {
12949  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_string())
12950  {
12951  throw type_error("The target node value type is not string type.", n.get_type());
12952  }
12953  s = n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::string_type &>();
12954 }
12955 
12961 template <
12962  typename BasicNodeType, typename CompatibleStringType,
12963  enable_if_t<
12964  conjunction<
12965  is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
12966  negation<std::is_same<CompatibleStringType, typename BasicNodeType::string_type>>,
12967  disjunction<std::is_constructible<CompatibleStringType,
12968  const typename BasicNodeType::string_type &>,
12969  std::is_assignable<CompatibleStringType,
12970  const typename BasicNodeType::string_type &>>>::value,
12971  int> = 0>
12972 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, CompatibleStringType &s)
12973 {
12974  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_string())
12975  {
12976  throw type_error("The target node value type is not string type.", n.get_type());
12977  }
12978  s = n.template get_value_ref<const typename BasicNodeType::string_type &>();
12979 }
12980 
12988 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T, typename U,
12989  enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
12990 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::pair<T, U> &p)
12991  -> decltype(std::declval<const BasicNodeType &>().template get_value<T>(),
12992  std::declval<const BasicNodeType &>().template get_value<U>(), void())
12993 {
12994  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
12995  {
12996  throw type_error("The target node value type is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
12997  }
12998 
12999  // call get_value_inplace(), not get_value(), since the storage to fill the result into is
13000  // already created.
13001  n.at(0).get_value_inplace(p.first);
13002  n.at(1).get_value_inplace(p.second);
13003 }
13004 
13012 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename... Types, std::size_t... Idx>
13013 inline std::tuple<Types...> from_node_tuple_impl(const BasicNodeType &n,
13014  index_sequence<Idx...> /*unused*/)
13015 {
13016  return std::make_tuple(n.at(Idx).template get_value<Types>()...);
13017 }
13018 
13025 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename... Types,
13026  enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13027 inline void from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::tuple<Types...> &t)
13028 {
13029  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_sequence())
13030  {
13031  throw type_error("The target node value type is not sequence type.", n.get_type());
13032  }
13033 
13034  // Types... must be explicitly specified; the retun type would otherwise be std::tuple with no
13035  // value types.
13036  t = from_node_tuple_impl<BasicNodeType, Types...>(n, index_sequence_for<Types...>{});
13037 }
13038 
13039 #ifdef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
13040 
13047 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13048  enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13049 inline auto from_node(const BasicNodeType &n, std::optional<T> &o)
13050  -> decltype(n.template get_value<T>(), void())
13051 {
13052  try
13053  {
13054  o.emplace(n.template get_value<T>());
13055  }
13056  catch (const std::exception & /*unused*/)
13057  {
13058  // Any exception derived from std::exception is interpreted as a conversion failure in some
13059  // way since user-defined from_node function may throw a different object from a
13060  // fkyaml::type_error. and std::exception is usually the base class of user-defined
13061  // exception types.
13062  o = std::nullopt;
13063  }
13064 }
13065 
13066 #endif // defined(FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17)
13067 
13071 struct from_node_fn
13072 {
13080  template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T>
13081  auto operator()(const BasicNodeType &n, T &&val) const
13082  noexcept(noexcept(from_node(n, std::forward<T>(val))))
13083  -> decltype(from_node(n, std::forward<T>(val)))
13084  {
13085  return from_node(n, std::forward<T>(val));
13086  }
13087 };
13088 
13089 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
13090 
13091 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13092 
13093 #ifndef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
13094 // anonymous namespace to hold `from_node` functor.
13095 // see http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2015/n4381.html for why it's needed.
13096 namespace // NOLINT(cert-dcl59-cpp,fuchsia-header-anon-namespaces,google-build-namespaces)
13097 {
13098 #endif
13099 
13101 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(misc-definitions-in-headers)
13102 FK_YAML_INLINE_VAR constexpr const auto &from_node =
13103  detail::static_const<detail::from_node_fn>::value;
13104 
13105 #ifndef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
13106 } // namespace
13107 #endif
13108 
13109 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_END
13110 
13111 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_CONVERSIONS_FROM_NODE_HPP */
13112 
13113 // #include <fkYAML/detail/conversions/to_node.hpp>
13114 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
13115 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
13116 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
13117 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
13118 //
13119 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
13120 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
13121 
13122 #ifndef FK_YAML_DETAIL_CONVERSIONS_TO_NODE_HPP
13123 #define FK_YAML_DETAIL_CONVERSIONS_TO_NODE_HPP
13124 
13125 #include <utility>
13126 
13127 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
13128 
13129 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/node_traits.hpp>
13130 
13131 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/type_traits.hpp>
13132 
13133 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/stl_supplement.hpp>
13134 
13135 // #include <fkYAML/detail/node_attrs.hpp>
13136 
13137 // #include <fkYAML/node_type.hpp>
13138 
13139 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13140 
13142 // external_node_constructor //
13144 
13151 template <node_type> struct external_node_constructor;
13152 
13154 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::SEQUENCE>
13155 {
13160  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13161  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, const typename BasicNodeType::sequence_type &s) noexcept
13162  {
13163  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13164  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
13165  n.m_node_value.p_sequence =
13166  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::sequence_type>(s);
13167  }
13168 
13173  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13174  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::sequence_type &&s) noexcept
13175  {
13176  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13177  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
13178  n.m_node_value.p_sequence =
13179  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::sequence_type>(
13180  std::move(s));
13181  }
13182 };
13183 
13185 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::MAPPING>
13186 {
13191  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13192  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, const typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type &m) noexcept
13193  {
13194  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13195  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
13196  n.m_node_value.p_mapping =
13197  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type>(m);
13198  }
13199 
13204  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13205  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type &&m) noexcept
13206  {
13207  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13208  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
13209  n.m_node_value.p_mapping =
13210  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type>(
13211  std::move(m));
13212  }
13213 };
13214 
13216 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::NULL_OBJECT>
13217 {
13222  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13223  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, std::nullptr_t /*unused*/) noexcept
13224  {
13225  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13226  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit;
13227  n.m_node_value.p_mapping = nullptr;
13228  }
13229 };
13230 
13232 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::BOOLEAN>
13233 {
13238  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13239  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::boolean_type b) noexcept
13240  {
13241  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13242  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit;
13243  n.m_node_value.boolean = b;
13244  }
13245 };
13246 
13248 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::INTEGER>
13249 {
13254  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13255  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::integer_type i) noexcept
13256  {
13257  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13258  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit;
13259  n.m_node_value.integer = i;
13260  }
13261 };
13262 
13264 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::FLOAT>
13265 {
13270  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13271  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::float_number_type f) noexcept
13272  {
13273  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13274  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit;
13275  n.m_node_value.float_val = f;
13276  }
13277 };
13278 
13280 template <> struct external_node_constructor<node_type::STRING>
13281 {
13286  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13287  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, const typename BasicNodeType::string_type &s) noexcept
13288  {
13289  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13290  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit;
13291  n.m_node_value.p_string =
13292  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::string_type>(s);
13293  }
13294 
13299  template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13300  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::string_type &&s) noexcept
13301  {
13302  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13303  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit;
13304  n.m_node_value.p_string =
13305  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::string_type>(
13306  std::move(s));
13307  }
13308 
13314  template <typename BasicNodeType, typename CompatibleStringType,
13315  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
13316  negation<std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::string_type,
13317  CompatibleStringType>>>::value,
13318  int> = 0>
13319  static void construct(BasicNodeType &n, const CompatibleStringType &s) noexcept
13320  {
13321  n.m_node_value.destroy(n.m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
13322  n.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit;
13323  n.m_node_value.p_string =
13324  BasicNodeType::template create_object<typename BasicNodeType::string_type>(s);
13325  }
13326 };
13327 
13329 // to_node //
13331 
13337 template <
13338  typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13339  enable_if_t<
13340  conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
13341  std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::sequence_type, remove_cvref_t<T>>>::value,
13342  int> = 0>
13343 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, T &&s) noexcept
13344 {
13345  external_node_constructor<node_type::SEQUENCE>::construct(n, std::forward<T>(s));
13346 }
13347 
13353 template <
13354  typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13355  enable_if_t<
13356  conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
13357  std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::mapping_type, remove_cvref_t<T>>>::value,
13358  int> = 0>
13359 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, T &&m) noexcept
13360 {
13361  external_node_constructor<node_type::MAPPING>::construct(n, std::forward<T>(m));
13362 }
13363 
13367 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename NullType,
13368  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
13369  std::is_same<NullType, std::nullptr_t>>::value,
13370  int> = 0>
13371 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, NullType /*unused*/)
13372 {
13373  external_node_constructor<node_type::NULL_OBJECT>::construct(n, nullptr);
13374 }
13375 
13381 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13382  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>,
13383  std::is_same<typename BasicNodeType::boolean_type, T>>::value,
13384  int> = 0>
13385 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, T b) noexcept
13386 {
13387  external_node_constructor<node_type::BOOLEAN>::construct(n, b);
13388 }
13389 
13395 template <
13396  typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13397  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>, is_non_bool_integral<T>>::value, int> = 0>
13398 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, T i) noexcept
13399 {
13400  external_node_constructor<node_type::INTEGER>::construct(n, i);
13401 }
13402 
13408 template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13409  enable_if_t<conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>, std::is_floating_point<T>>::value,
13410  int> = 0>
13411 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, T f) noexcept
13412 {
13413  external_node_constructor<node_type::FLOAT>::construct(n, f);
13414 }
13415 
13421 template <
13422  typename BasicNodeType, typename T,
13423  enable_if_t<
13424  conjunction<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>, negation<is_null_pointer<T>>,
13425  std::is_constructible<typename BasicNodeType::string_type, const T &>>::value,
13426  int> = 0>
13427 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, const T &s)
13428 {
13429  external_node_constructor<node_type::STRING>::construct(n, s);
13430 }
13431 
13436 template <typename BasicNodeType, enable_if_t<is_basic_node<BasicNodeType>::value, int> = 0>
13437 inline void to_node(BasicNodeType &n, typename BasicNodeType::string_type &&s) noexcept
13438 {
13439  external_node_constructor<node_type::STRING>::construct(n, std::move(s));
13440 }
13441 
13445 struct to_node_fn
13446 {
13454  template <typename BasicNodeType, typename T>
13455  auto operator()(BasicNodeType &n, T &&val) const
13456  noexcept(noexcept(to_node(n, std::forward<T>(val))))
13457  -> decltype(to_node(n, std::forward<T>(val)))
13458  {
13459  return to_node(n, std::forward<T>(val));
13460  }
13461 };
13462 
13463 FK_YAML_DETAIL_NAMESPACE_END
13464 
13465 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13466 
13467 #ifndef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
13468 // anonymous namespace to hold `to_node` functor.
13469 // see http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2015/n4381.html for why it's needed.
13470 namespace // NOLINT(cert-dcl59-cpp,fuchsia-header-anon-namespaces,google-build-namespaces)
13471 {
13472 #endif
13473 
13475 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(misc-definitions-in-headers)
13476 FK_YAML_INLINE_VAR constexpr const auto &to_node = detail::static_const<detail::to_node_fn>::value;
13477 
13478 #ifndef FK_YAML_HAS_CXX_17
13479 } // namespace
13480 #endif
13481 
13482 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_END
13483 
13484 #endif /* FK_YAML_DETAIL_CONVERSIONS_TO_NODE_HPP */
13485 
13486 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13487 
13491 template <typename ValueType, typename> class node_value_converter
13492 {
13493  public:
13500  template <typename BasicNodeType, typename TargetType = ValueType>
13501  static auto from_node(BasicNodeType &&n, TargetType &val) noexcept(
13502  noexcept(::fkyaml::from_node(std::forward<BasicNodeType>(n), val)))
13503  -> decltype(::fkyaml::from_node(std::forward<BasicNodeType>(n), val), void())
13504  {
13505  ::fkyaml::from_node(std::forward<BasicNodeType>(n), val);
13506  }
13507 
13514  template <typename BasicNodeType, typename TargetType = ValueType>
13515  static auto to_node(BasicNodeType &n, TargetType &&val) noexcept(
13516  noexcept(::fkyaml::to_node(n, std::forward<TargetType>(val))))
13517  -> decltype(::fkyaml::to_node(n, std::forward<TargetType>(val)))
13518  {
13519  ::fkyaml::to_node(n, std::forward<TargetType>(val));
13520  }
13521 };
13522 
13523 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_END
13524 
13525 #endif /* FK_YAML_NODE_VALUE_CONVERTER_HPP */
13526 
13527 // #include <fkYAML/ordered_map.hpp>
13528 // _______ __ __ __ _____ __ __ __
13529 // | __| |_/ | \_/ |/ _ \ / \/ \| | fkYAML: A C++ header-only YAML library
13530 // | __| _ < \_ _/| ___ | _ | |___ version 0.4.0
13531 // |__| |_| \__| |_| |_| |_|___||___|______| https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML
13532 //
13533 // SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2023-2024 Kensuke Fukutani <fktn.dev@gmail.com>
13534 // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
13535 
13536 #ifndef FK_YAML_ORDERED_MAP_HPP
13537 #define FK_YAML_ORDERED_MAP_HPP
13538 
13539 #include <functional>
13540 #include <initializer_list>
13541 #include <memory>
13542 #include <utility>
13543 #include <vector>
13544 
13545 // #include <fkYAML/detail/macros/define_macros.hpp>
13546 
13547 // #include <fkYAML/detail/meta/type_traits.hpp>
13548 
13549 // #include <fkYAML/exception.hpp>
13550 
13551 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13552 
13559 template <typename Key, typename Value, typename IgnoredCompare = std::less<Key>,
13560  typename Allocator = std::allocator<std::pair<const Key, Value>>>
13561 class ordered_map : public std::vector<std::pair<const Key, Value>, Allocator>
13562 {
13563  public:
13566  using key_type = Key;
13567 
13570  using mapped_type = Value;
13571 
13574  using Container = std::vector<std::pair<const Key, Value>, Allocator>;
13575 
13578  using value_type = typename Container::value_type;
13579 
13582  using iterator = typename Container::iterator;
13583 
13586  using const_iterator = typename Container::const_iterator;
13587 
13590  using size_type = typename Container::size_type;
13591 
13594  using key_compare = std::equal_to<Key>;
13595 
13596  public:
13599  ordered_map() noexcept(noexcept(Container())) : Container()
13600  {
13601  }
13602 
13606  ordered_map(std::initializer_list<value_type> init) : Container{init}
13607  {
13608  }
13609 
13610  public:
13616  template <typename KeyType,
13617  detail::enable_if_t<
13618  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13619  mapped_type &operator[](KeyType &&key) noexcept
13620  {
13621  return emplace(std::forward<KeyType>(key), mapped_type()).first->second;
13622  }
13623 
13624  public:
13631  template <typename KeyType,
13632  detail::enable_if_t<
13633  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13634  std::pair<iterator, bool> emplace(KeyType &&key, const mapped_type &value) noexcept
13635  {
13636  for (auto itr = this->begin(); itr != this->end(); ++itr)
13637  {
13638  if (m_compare(itr->first, key))
13639  {
13640  return {itr, false};
13641  }
13642  }
13643  this->emplace_back(std::forward<KeyType>(key), value);
13644  return {std::prev(this->end()), true};
13645  }
13646 
13652  template <typename KeyType,
13653  detail::enable_if_t<
13654  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13655  mapped_type &at(KeyType &&key)
13656  { // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
13657  for (auto itr = this->begin(); itr != this->end(); ++itr)
13658  {
13659  if (m_compare(itr->first, key))
13660  {
13661  return itr->second;
13662  }
13663  }
13664  throw fkyaml::exception("key not found.");
13665  }
13666 
13672  template <typename KeyType,
13673  detail::enable_if_t<
13674  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13675  const mapped_type &at(KeyType &&key) const
13676  { // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
13677  for (auto itr = this->begin(); itr != this->end(); ++itr)
13678  {
13679  if (m_compare(itr->first, key))
13680  {
13681  return itr->second;
13682  }
13683  }
13684  throw fkyaml::exception("key not found.");
13685  }
13686 
13692  template <typename KeyType,
13693  detail::enable_if_t<
13694  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13695  iterator find(KeyType &&key) noexcept
13696  { // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
13697  for (auto itr = this->begin(); itr != this->end(); ++itr)
13698  {
13699  if (m_compare(itr->first, key))
13700  {
13701  return itr;
13702  }
13703  }
13704  return this->end();
13705  }
13706 
13712  template <typename KeyType,
13713  detail::enable_if_t<
13714  detail::is_usable_as_key_type<key_compare, key_type, KeyType>::value, int> = 0>
13715  const_iterator find(KeyType &&key) const noexcept
13716  { // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-missing-std-forward)
13717  for (auto itr = this->begin(); itr != this->end(); ++itr)
13718  {
13719  if (m_compare(itr->first, key))
13720  {
13721  return itr;
13722  }
13723  }
13724  return this->end();
13725  }
13726 
13727  private:
13729  key_compare m_compare{};
13730 };
13731 
13732 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_END
13733 
13734 #endif /* FK_YAML_ORDERED_MAP_HPP */
13735 
13736 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
13737 
13740 template <template <typename, typename...> class SequenceType,
13741  template <typename, typename, typename...> class MappingType, typename BooleanType,
13742  typename IntegerType, typename FloatNumberType, typename StringType,
13743  template <typename, typename = void> class ConverterType>
13744 class basic_node
13745 {
13746  public:
13749  using sequence_type = SequenceType<basic_node, std::allocator<basic_node>>;
13750 
13754  using mapping_type = MappingType<basic_node, basic_node>;
13755 
13758  using boolean_type = BooleanType;
13759 
13762  using integer_type = IntegerType;
13763 
13766  using float_number_type = FloatNumberType;
13767 
13770  using string_type = StringType;
13771 
13774  using value_type = basic_node;
13775 
13778  using reference = value_type &;
13779 
13782  using const_reference = const value_type &;
13783 
13786  using pointer = value_type *;
13787 
13790  using const_pointer = const value_type *;
13791 
13794  using size_type = std::size_t;
13795 
13798  using difference_type = std::ptrdiff_t;
13799 
13802  using iterator = fkyaml::detail::iterator<basic_node>;
13803 
13806  using const_iterator = fkyaml::detail::iterator<const basic_node>;
13807 
13810  using reverse_iterator = fkyaml::detail::reverse_iterator<iterator>;
13811 
13814  using const_reverse_iterator = fkyaml::detail::reverse_iterator<const_iterator>;
13815 
13818  template <typename T, typename SFINAE> using value_converter_type = ConverterType<T, SFINAE>;
13819 
13823  using node_t = detail::node_t;
13824 
13828  using yaml_version_t = detail::yaml_version_t;
13829 
13830  private:
13831  template <node_type> friend struct fkyaml::detail::external_node_constructor;
13832 
13833  template <typename BasicNodeType> friend class fkyaml::detail::basic_deserializer;
13834 
13835  template <typename BasicNodeType> friend class fkyaml::detail::basic_serializer;
13836 
13838  using deserializer_type = detail::basic_deserializer<basic_node>;
13840  using serializer_type = detail::basic_serializer<basic_node>;
13842  using initializer_list_t = std::initializer_list<detail::node_ref_storage<basic_node>>;
13843 
13849  union node_value {
13851  node_value() = default;
13852 
13856  explicit node_value(detail::node_attr_t value_type_bit)
13857  {
13858  switch (value_type_bit)
13859  {
13860  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
13861  p_sequence = create_object<sequence_type>();
13862  break;
13863  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
13864  p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>();
13865  break;
13866  case detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit:
13867  p_mapping = nullptr;
13868  break;
13869  case detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit:
13870  boolean = static_cast<boolean_type>(false);
13871  break;
13872  case detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit:
13873  integer = static_cast<integer_type>(0);
13874  break;
13875  case detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit:
13876  float_val = static_cast<float_number_type>(0.0);
13877  break;
13878  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
13879  p_string = create_object<string_type>();
13880  break;
13881  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13882  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13883  }
13884  }
13885 
13889  void destroy(detail::node_attr_t value_type_bit)
13890  {
13891  switch (value_type_bit)
13892  {
13893  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
13894  p_sequence->clear();
13895  destroy_object<sequence_type>(p_sequence);
13896  p_sequence = nullptr;
13897  break;
13898  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
13899  p_mapping->clear();
13900  destroy_object<mapping_type>(p_mapping);
13901  p_mapping = nullptr;
13902  break;
13903  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
13904  destroy_object<string_type>(p_string);
13905  p_string = nullptr;
13906  break;
13907  default:
13908  break;
13909  }
13910  }
13911 
13913  sequence_type *p_sequence;
13916  mapping_type *p_mapping{nullptr};
13918  boolean_type boolean;
13920  integer_type integer;
13922  float_number_type float_val;
13924  string_type *p_string;
13925  };
13926 
13927  private:
13933  template <typename ObjType, typename... ArgTypes>
13934  static ObjType *create_object(ArgTypes &&...args)
13935  {
13936  using AllocType = std::allocator<ObjType>;
13937  using AllocTraitsType = std::allocator_traits<AllocType>;
13938 
13939  AllocType alloc{};
13940  auto deleter = [&alloc](ObjType *obj) {
13941  AllocTraitsType::destroy(alloc, obj);
13942  AllocTraitsType::deallocate(alloc, obj, 1);
13943  };
13944 
13945  std::unique_ptr<ObjType, decltype(deleter)> object(AllocTraitsType::allocate(alloc, 1),
13946  deleter);
13947  AllocTraitsType::construct(alloc, object.get(), std::forward<ArgTypes>(args)...);
13948 
13949  FK_YAML_ASSERT(object != nullptr);
13950  return object.release();
13951  }
13952 
13957  template <typename ObjType> static void destroy_object(ObjType *obj)
13958  {
13959  FK_YAML_ASSERT(obj != nullptr);
13960  std::allocator<ObjType> alloc;
13961  std::allocator_traits<decltype(alloc)>::destroy(alloc, obj);
13962  std::allocator_traits<decltype(alloc)>::deallocate(alloc, obj, 1);
13963  }
13964 
13965  public:
13968  basic_node() = default;
13969 
13973  FK_YAML_DEPRECATED("Since 0.3.12; Use explicit basic_node(const node_type)")
13974  explicit basic_node(const node_t type) : basic_node(detail::convert_to_node_type(type))
13975  {
13976  }
13977 
13978  explicit basic_node(const node_type type)
13979  : m_attrs(detail::node_attr_bits::from_node_type(type)),
13980  m_node_value(m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
13981  {
13982  }
13983 
13987  basic_node(const basic_node &rhs)
13988  : m_attrs(rhs.m_attrs), mp_meta(rhs.mp_meta), m_prop(rhs.m_prop)
13989  {
13990  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (!has_anchor_name())
13991  {
13992  switch (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
13993  {
13994  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
13995  m_node_value.p_sequence =
13996  create_object<sequence_type>(*(rhs.m_node_value.p_sequence));
13997  break;
13998  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
13999  m_node_value.p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>(*(rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping));
14000  break;
14001  case detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit:
14002  m_node_value.p_mapping = nullptr;
14003  break;
14004  case detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit:
14005  m_node_value.boolean = rhs.m_node_value.boolean;
14006  break;
14007  case detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit:
14008  m_node_value.integer = rhs.m_node_value.integer;
14009  break;
14010  case detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit:
14011  m_node_value.float_val = rhs.m_node_value.float_val;
14012  break;
14013  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
14014  m_node_value.p_string = create_object<string_type>(*(rhs.m_node_value.p_string));
14015  break;
14016  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14017  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14018  }
14019  }
14020  }
14021 
14025  basic_node(basic_node &&rhs) noexcept
14026  : m_attrs(rhs.m_attrs), mp_meta(std::move(rhs.mp_meta)), m_prop(std::move(rhs.m_prop))
14027  {
14028  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (!has_anchor_name())
14029  {
14030  switch (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
14031  {
14032  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
14033  FK_YAML_ASSERT(rhs.m_node_value.p_sequence != nullptr);
14034  m_node_value.p_sequence = rhs.m_node_value.p_sequence;
14035  rhs.m_node_value.p_sequence = nullptr;
14036  break;
14037  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
14038  FK_YAML_ASSERT(rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping != nullptr);
14039  m_node_value.p_mapping = rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping;
14040  rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping = nullptr;
14041  break;
14042  case detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit:
14043  FK_YAML_ASSERT(rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping == nullptr);
14044  m_node_value.p_mapping = rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping;
14045  break;
14046  case detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit:
14047  m_node_value.boolean = rhs.m_node_value.boolean;
14048  rhs.m_node_value.boolean = static_cast<boolean_type>(false);
14049  break;
14050  case detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit:
14051  m_node_value.integer = rhs.m_node_value.integer;
14052  rhs.m_node_value.integer = static_cast<integer_type>(0);
14053  break;
14054  case detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit:
14055  m_node_value.float_val = rhs.m_node_value.float_val;
14056  rhs.m_node_value.float_val = static_cast<float_number_type>(0.0);
14057  break;
14058  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
14059  FK_YAML_ASSERT(rhs.m_node_value.p_string != nullptr);
14060  m_node_value.p_string = rhs.m_node_value.p_string;
14061  rhs.m_node_value.p_string = nullptr;
14062  break;
14063  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14064  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14065  }
14066  }
14067 
14068  rhs.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::default_bits;
14069  rhs.m_node_value.p_mapping = nullptr;
14070  }
14071 
14077  template <typename CompatibleType, typename U = detail::remove_cvref_t<CompatibleType>,
14078  detail::enable_if_t<
14079  detail::conjunction<
14080  detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<U>>,
14081  detail::disjunction<detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node, U>>>::value,
14082  int> = 0>
14083  basic_node(CompatibleType &&val) noexcept(noexcept(ConverterType<U, void>::to_node(
14084  std::declval<basic_node &>(), std::declval<CompatibleType>())))
14085  {
14086  ConverterType<U, void>::to_node(*this, std::forward<CompatibleType>(val));
14087  }
14088 
14093  template <typename NodeRefStorageType,
14094  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_node_ref_storage<NodeRefStorageType>::value, int> = 0>
14095  basic_node(const NodeRefStorageType &node_ref_storage) noexcept
14096  : basic_node(node_ref_storage.release())
14097  {
14098  }
14099 
14103  basic_node(initializer_list_t init)
14104  {
14105  bool is_mapping = std::all_of(init.begin(), init.end(),
14106  [](const detail::node_ref_storage<basic_node> &node_ref) {
14107  return node_ref->is_sequence() && node_ref->size() == 2;
14108  });
14109 
14110  if (is_mapping)
14111  {
14112  m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
14113  m_node_value.p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>();
14114 
14115  for (auto &elem_ref : init)
14116  {
14117  auto elem = elem_ref.release();
14118  m_node_value.p_mapping->emplace(std::move((*(elem.m_node_value.p_sequence))[0]),
14119  std::move((*(elem.m_node_value.p_sequence))[1]));
14120  }
14121  }
14122  else
14123  {
14124  m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
14125  m_node_value.p_sequence = create_object<sequence_type>();
14126  m_node_value.p_sequence->reserve(std::distance(init.begin(), init.end()));
14127  for (auto &elem_ref : init)
14128  {
14129  m_node_value.p_sequence->emplace_back(std::move(elem_ref.release()));
14130  }
14131  }
14132  }
14133 
14136  ~basic_node() noexcept // NOLINT(bugprone-exception-escape)
14137  {
14138  if (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring)
14139  {
14140  if (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::anchor_bit)
14141  {
14142  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
14143  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
14144  itr->second.m_node_value.destroy(itr->second.m_attrs &
14145  detail::node_attr_mask::value);
14146  itr->second.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::default_bits;
14147  itr->second.mp_meta.reset();
14148  }
14149  }
14150  else if ((m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit) == 0)
14151  {
14152  m_node_value.destroy(m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::value);
14153  }
14154 
14155  m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::default_bits;
14156  mp_meta.reset();
14157  }
14158 
14159  public:
14165  template <typename InputType> static basic_node deserialize(InputType &&input)
14166  {
14167  return deserializer_type().deserialize(
14168  detail::input_adapter(std::forward<InputType>(input)));
14169  }
14170 
14178  template <typename ItrType> static basic_node deserialize(ItrType begin, ItrType end)
14179  {
14180  return deserializer_type().deserialize(
14181  detail::input_adapter(std::forward<ItrType>(begin), std::forward<ItrType>(end)));
14182  }
14183 
14189  template <typename InputType> static std::vector<basic_node> deserialize_docs(InputType &&input)
14190  {
14191  return deserializer_type().deserialize_docs(
14192  detail::input_adapter(std::forward<InputType>(input)));
14193  }
14194 
14202  template <typename ItrType>
14203  static std::vector<basic_node> deserialize_docs(ItrType &&begin, ItrType &&end)
14204  {
14205  return deserializer_type().deserialize_docs(
14206  detail::input_adapter(std::forward<ItrType>(begin), std::forward<ItrType>(end)));
14207  }
14208 
14213  static std::string serialize(const basic_node &node)
14214  {
14215  return serializer_type().serialize(node);
14216  }
14217 
14222  static std::string serialize_docs(const std::vector<basic_node> &docs)
14223  {
14224  return serializer_type().serialize_docs(docs);
14225  }
14226 
14230  static basic_node sequence()
14231  {
14232  basic_node node;
14233  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
14234  node.m_node_value.p_sequence = create_object<sequence_type>();
14235  return node;
14236  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14237 
14242  static basic_node sequence(const sequence_type &seq)
14243  {
14244  basic_node node;
14245  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
14246  node.m_node_value.p_sequence = create_object<sequence_type>(seq);
14247  return node;
14248  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14249 
14254  static basic_node sequence(sequence_type &&seq)
14255  {
14256  basic_node node;
14257  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
14258  node.m_node_value.p_sequence = create_object<sequence_type>(std::move(seq));
14259  return node;
14260  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14261 
14265  static basic_node mapping()
14266  {
14267  basic_node node;
14268  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
14269  node.m_node_value.p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>();
14270  return node;
14271  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14272 
14277  static basic_node mapping(const mapping_type &map)
14278  {
14279  basic_node node;
14280  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
14281  node.m_node_value.p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>(map);
14282  return node;
14283  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14284 
14289  static basic_node mapping(mapping_type &&map)
14290  {
14291  basic_node node;
14292  node.m_attrs = detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
14293  node.m_node_value.p_mapping = create_object<mapping_type>(std::move(map));
14294  return node;
14295  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14296 
14303  static basic_node alias_of(const basic_node &anchor_node)
14304  {
14305  constexpr detail::node_attr_t anchor_bit = detail::node_attr_bits::anchor_bit;
14306 
14307  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!anchor_node.has_anchor_name() || !(anchor_node.m_attrs & anchor_bit))
14308  {
14309  throw fkyaml::exception("Cannot create an alias without anchor name.");
14310  }
14311 
14312  basic_node node = anchor_node;
14313  node.m_attrs &= ~detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring;
14314  node.m_attrs |= detail::node_attr_bits::alias_bit;
14315  return node;
14316  } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14317 
14318  public:
14323  basic_node &operator=(const basic_node &rhs) noexcept
14324  {
14325  basic_node(rhs).swap(*this);
14326  return *this;
14327  }
14328 
14333  basic_node &operator=(basic_node &&rhs) noexcept
14334  {
14335  basic_node(std::move(rhs)).swap(*this);
14336  return *this;
14337  }
14338 
14346  template <typename KeyType,
14347  detail::enable_if_t<
14348  detail::conjunction<detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<KeyType>>,
14349  detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node, KeyType>>::value,
14350  int> = 0>
14351  basic_node &operator[](KeyType &&key)
14352  {
14353  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14354  {
14355  throw fkyaml::type_error("operator[] is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14356  }
14357 
14358  basic_node n = std::forward<KeyType>(key);
14359  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14360 
14361  if (is_sequence())
14362  {
14363  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!n.is_integer())
14364  {
14365  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14366  "An argument of operator[] for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14367  }
14368  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14369  return p_node_value->p_sequence->operator[](n.get_value<int>());
14370  }
14371 
14372  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14373  return p_node_value->p_mapping->operator[](std::move(n));
14374  }
14375 
14383  template <typename KeyType,
14384  detail::enable_if_t<
14385  detail::conjunction<detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<KeyType>>,
14386  detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node, KeyType>>::value,
14387  int> = 0>
14388  const basic_node &operator[](KeyType &&key) const
14389  {
14390  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14391  {
14392  throw fkyaml::type_error("operator[] is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14393  }
14394 
14395  basic_node node_key = std::forward<KeyType>(key);
14396  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14397 
14398  if (is_sequence())
14399  {
14400  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!node_key.is_integer())
14401  {
14402  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14403  "An argument of operator[] for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14404  }
14405  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14406  return p_node_value->p_sequence->operator[](node_key.get_value<int>());
14407  }
14408 
14409  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14410  return p_node_value->p_mapping->operator[](std::move(node_key));
14411  }
14412 
14419  template <
14420  typename KeyType,
14421  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>::value, int> = 0>
14422  basic_node &operator[](KeyType &&key)
14423  {
14424  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14425  {
14426  throw fkyaml::type_error("operator[] is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14427  }
14428 
14429  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14430 
14431  if (is_sequence())
14432  {
14433  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!key.is_integer())
14434  {
14435  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14436  "An argument of operator[] for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14437  }
14438  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14439  return p_node_value->p_sequence->operator[](key.template get_value<int>());
14440  }
14441 
14442  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14443  return p_node_value->p_mapping->operator[](std::forward<KeyType>(key));
14444  }
14445 
14452  template <
14453  typename KeyType,
14454  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>::value, int> = 0>
14455  const basic_node &operator[](KeyType &&key) const
14456  {
14457  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14458  {
14459  throw fkyaml::type_error("operator[] is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14460  }
14461 
14462  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14463 
14464  if (is_sequence())
14465  {
14466  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!key.is_integer())
14467  {
14468  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14469  "An argument of operator[] for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14470  }
14471  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14472  return p_node_value->p_sequence->operator[](key.template get_value<int>());
14473  }
14474 
14475  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14476  return p_node_value->p_mapping->operator[](std::forward<KeyType>(key));
14477  }
14478 
14483  bool operator==(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14484  {
14485  const detail::node_attr_t this_val_bit = get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value;
14486  if (this_val_bit != (rhs.get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value))
14487  {
14488  return false;
14489  }
14490 
14491  const node_value *this_node_value_ptr = get_node_value_ptr();
14492  const node_value *other_node_value_ptr = rhs.get_node_value_ptr();
14493 
14494  bool ret = false;
14495  switch (this_val_bit)
14496  {
14497  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
14498  ret = (*(this_node_value_ptr->p_sequence) == *(other_node_value_ptr->p_sequence));
14499  break;
14500  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
14501  ret = (*(this_node_value_ptr->p_mapping) == *(other_node_value_ptr->p_mapping));
14502  break;
14503  case detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit:
14504  // Always true for comparisons between null nodes.
14505  ret = true;
14506  break;
14507  case detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit:
14508  ret = (this_node_value_ptr->boolean == other_node_value_ptr->boolean);
14509  break;
14510  case detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit:
14511  ret = (this_node_value_ptr->integer == other_node_value_ptr->integer);
14512  break;
14513  case detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit:
14514  ret = (std::abs(this_node_value_ptr->float_val - other_node_value_ptr->float_val) <
14515  std::numeric_limits<float_number_type>::epsilon());
14516  break;
14517  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
14518  ret = (*(this_node_value_ptr->p_string) == *(other_node_value_ptr->p_string));
14519  break;
14520  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14521  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14522  }
14523 
14524  return ret;
14525  }
14526 
14531  bool operator!=(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14532  {
14533  return !operator==(rhs);
14534  }
14535 
14540  bool operator<(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14541  {
14542  if (operator==(rhs))
14543  {
14544  return false;
14545  }
14546 
14547  const detail::node_attr_t this_val_bit = get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value;
14548  const detail::node_attr_t other_val_bit =
14549  rhs.get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value;
14550 
14551  if (this_val_bit < other_val_bit)
14552  {
14553  return true;
14554  }
14555 
14556  if (this_val_bit != other_val_bit)
14557  {
14558  return false;
14559  }
14560 
14561  const node_value *p_this_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14562  const node_value *p_other_value = rhs.get_node_value_ptr();
14563 
14564  bool ret = false;
14565  switch (this_val_bit)
14566  {
14567  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
14568  ret = (*(p_this_value->p_sequence) < *(p_other_value->p_sequence));
14569  break;
14570  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
14571  ret = (*(p_this_value->p_mapping) < *(p_other_value->p_mapping));
14572  break;
14573  case detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14574  // Will not come here since null nodes are always the same.
14575  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14576  case detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit:
14577  // false < true
14578  ret = (!p_this_value->boolean && p_other_value->boolean);
14579  break;
14580  case detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit:
14581  ret = (p_this_value->integer < p_other_value->integer);
14582  break;
14583  case detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit:
14584  ret = (p_this_value->float_val < p_other_value->float_val);
14585  break;
14586  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
14587  ret = (*(p_this_value->p_string) < *(p_other_value->p_string));
14588  break;
14589  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14590  detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14591  }
14592 
14593  return ret;
14594  }
14595 
14600  bool operator<=(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14601  {
14602  return !rhs.operator<(*this);
14603  }
14604 
14609  bool operator>(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14610  {
14611  return !operator<=(rhs);
14612  }
14613 
14618  bool operator>=(const basic_node &rhs) const noexcept
14619  {
14620  return !operator<(rhs);
14621  }
14622 
14623  public:
14627  node_type get_type() const noexcept
14628  {
14629  const detail::node_attr_t attrs = get_node_attrs();
14630  return detail::node_attr_bits::to_node_type(attrs);
14631  }
14632 
14637  FK_YAML_DEPRECATED("Since 0.3.12; Use get_type()")
14638  node_t type() const noexcept
14639  {
14640  node_type tmp_type = get_type();
14641  return detail::convert_from_node_type(tmp_type);
14642  }
14643 
14647  bool is_sequence() const noexcept
14648  {
14649  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit;
14650  }
14651 
14655  bool is_mapping() const noexcept
14656  {
14657  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit;
14658  }
14659 
14663  bool is_null() const noexcept
14664  {
14665  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::null_bit;
14666  }
14667 
14671  bool is_boolean() const noexcept
14672  {
14673  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit;
14674  }
14675 
14679  bool is_integer() const noexcept
14680  {
14681  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit;
14682  }
14683 
14687  bool is_float_number() const noexcept
14688  {
14689  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit;
14690  }
14691 
14695  bool is_string() const noexcept
14696  {
14697  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit;
14698  }
14699 
14703  bool is_scalar() const noexcept
14704  {
14705  return get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::scalar_bits;
14706  }
14707 
14711  bool is_anchor() const noexcept
14712  {
14713  return m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::anchor_bit;
14714  }
14715 
14719  bool is_alias() const noexcept
14720  {
14721  return m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::alias_bit;
14722  }
14723 
14727  bool empty() const
14728  {
14729  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
14730  {
14731  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit: {
14732  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14733  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14734  return p_node_value->p_sequence->empty();
14735  }
14736  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit: {
14737  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14738  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14739  return p_node_value->p_mapping->empty();
14740  }
14741  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit: {
14742  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14743  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_string != nullptr);
14744  return p_node_value->p_string->empty();
14745  }
14746  default:
14747  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is not of a container type.", get_type());
14748  }
14749  }
14750 
14754  std::size_t size() const
14755  {
14756  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14757  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
14758  {
14759  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit:
14760  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14761  return p_node_value->p_sequence->size();
14762  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit:
14763  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14764  return p_node_value->p_mapping->size();
14765  case detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit:
14766  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_string != nullptr);
14767  return p_node_value->p_string->size();
14768  default:
14769  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is not of a container type.", get_type());
14770  }
14771  }
14772 
14778  template <typename KeyType,
14779  detail::enable_if_t<
14780  detail::conjunction<
14781  detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>>,
14782  detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node,
14783  detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>>::value,
14784  int> = 0>
14785  bool contains(KeyType &&key) const
14786  {
14787  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit)
14788  {
14789  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14790  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14791 
14792  const mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
14793  basic_node node_key = std::forward<KeyType>(key);
14794  return map.find(std::move(node_key)) != map.end();
14795  }
14796 
14797  return false;
14798  }
14799 
14805  template <
14806  typename KeyType,
14807  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>::value, int> = 0>
14808  bool contains(KeyType &&key) const
14809  {
14810  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit)
14811  {
14812  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14813  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14814 
14815  const mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
14816  return map.find(std::forward<KeyType>(key)) != map.end();
14817  }
14818 
14819  return false;
14820  }
14821 
14827  template <typename KeyType,
14828  detail::enable_if_t<
14829  detail::conjunction<detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<KeyType>>,
14830  detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node, KeyType>>::value,
14831  int> = 0>
14832  basic_node &at(KeyType &&key)
14833  {
14834  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14835  {
14836  throw fkyaml::type_error("at() is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14837  }
14838 
14839  basic_node node_key = std::forward<KeyType>(key);
14840  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14841 
14842  if (is_sequence())
14843  {
14844  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!node_key.is_integer())
14845  {
14846  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14847  "An argument of at() for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14848  }
14849 
14850  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14851  sequence_type &seq = *p_node_value->p_sequence;
14852  int index = node_key.template get_value<int>();
14853  int size = static_cast<int>(seq.size());
14854  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (index >= size)
14855  {
14856  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(index);
14857  }
14858  return seq.at(index);
14859  }
14860 
14861  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14862  mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
14863  bool is_found = map.find(node_key) != map.end();
14864  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_found)
14865  {
14866  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(serialize(node_key).c_str());
14867  }
14868  return map.at(node_key);
14869  }
14870 
14876  template <typename KeyType,
14877  detail::enable_if_t<
14878  detail::conjunction<detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<KeyType>>,
14879  detail::is_node_compatible_type<basic_node, KeyType>>::value,
14880  int> = 0>
14881  const basic_node &at(KeyType &&key) const
14882  {
14883  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14884  {
14885  throw fkyaml::type_error("at() is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14886  }
14887 
14888  basic_node node_key = std::forward<KeyType>(key);
14889  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14890 
14891  if (is_sequence())
14892  {
14893  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!node_key.is_integer())
14894  {
14895  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14896  "An argument of at() for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14897  }
14898 
14899  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14900  const sequence_type &seq = *p_node_value->p_sequence;
14901  int index = node_key.template get_value<int>();
14902  int size = static_cast<int>(seq.size());
14903  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (index >= size)
14904  {
14905  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(index);
14906  }
14907  return seq.at(index);
14908  }
14909 
14910  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14911  const mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
14912  bool is_found = map.find(node_key) != map.end();
14913  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_found)
14914  {
14915  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(serialize(node_key).c_str());
14916  }
14917  return map.at(node_key);
14918  }
14919 
14925  template <
14926  typename KeyType,
14927  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>::value, int> = 0>
14928  basic_node &at(KeyType &&key)
14929  {
14930  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14931  {
14932  throw fkyaml::type_error("at() is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14933  }
14934 
14935  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14936 
14937  if (is_sequence())
14938  {
14939  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!key.is_integer())
14940  {
14941  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14942  "An argument of at() for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14943  }
14944 
14945  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14946  sequence_type &seq = *p_node_value->p_sequence;
14947  int index = std::forward<KeyType>(key).template get_value<int>();
14948  int size = static_cast<int>(seq.size());
14949  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (index >= size)
14950  {
14951  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(index);
14952  }
14953  return seq.at(index);
14954  }
14955 
14956  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
14957  mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
14958  bool is_found = map.find(key) != map.end();
14959  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_found)
14960  {
14961  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(serialize(key).c_str());
14962  }
14963  return map.at(key);
14964  }
14965 
14971  template <
14972  typename KeyType,
14973  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<detail::remove_cvref_t<KeyType>>::value, int> = 0>
14974  const basic_node &at(KeyType &&key) const
14975  {
14976  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (is_scalar())
14977  {
14978  throw fkyaml::type_error("at() is unavailable for a scalar node.", get_type());
14979  }
14980 
14981  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
14982 
14983  if (is_sequence())
14984  {
14985  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!key.is_integer())
14986  {
14987  throw fkyaml::type_error(
14988  "An argument of at() for sequence nodes must be an integer.", get_type());
14989  }
14990 
14991  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
14992  const sequence_type &seq = *p_node_value->p_sequence;
14993  int index = std::forward<KeyType>(key).template get_value<int>();
14994  int size = static_cast<int>(seq.size());
14995  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (index >= size)
14996  {
14997  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(index);
14998  }
14999  return seq.at(index);
15000  }
15001 
15002  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
15003  const mapping_type &map = *p_node_value->p_mapping;
15004  bool is_found = map.find(key) != map.end();
15005  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!is_found)
15006  {
15007  throw fkyaml::out_of_range(serialize(key).c_str());
15008  }
15009  return map.at(key);
15010  }
15011 
15015  yaml_version_type get_yaml_version_type() const noexcept
15016  {
15017  return mp_meta->is_version_specified ? mp_meta->version : yaml_version_type::VERSION_1_2;
15018  }
15019 
15023  void set_yaml_version_type(const yaml_version_type version) noexcept
15024  {
15025  mp_meta->version = version;
15026  mp_meta->is_version_specified = true;
15027  }
15028 
15033  FK_YAML_DEPRECATED("Since 0.3.12; Use get_yaml_version_type()")
15034  yaml_version_t get_yaml_version() const noexcept
15035  {
15036  yaml_version_type tmp_type = get_yaml_version_type();
15037  return detail::convert_from_yaml_version_type(tmp_type);
15038  }
15039 
15044  FK_YAML_DEPRECATED("Since 0.3.12; Use set_yaml_version_type(const yaml_version_type)")
15045  void set_yaml_version(const yaml_version_t version) noexcept
15046  {
15047  set_yaml_version_type(detail::convert_to_yaml_version_type(version));
15048  }
15049 
15053  bool has_anchor_name() const noexcept
15054  {
15055  return (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring) && !m_prop.anchor.empty();
15056  }
15057 
15063  const std::string &get_anchor_name() const
15064  {
15065  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!has_anchor_name())
15066  {
15067  throw fkyaml::exception("No anchor name has been set.");
15068  }
15069  return m_prop.anchor;
15070  }
15071 
15077  void add_anchor_name(const std::string &anchor_name)
15078  {
15079  if (is_anchor())
15080  {
15081  m_attrs &= ~detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring;
15082  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15083  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15084  mp_meta.reset();
15085  itr->second.swap(*this);
15086  mp_meta->anchor_table.erase(itr);
15087  }
15088 
15089  auto p_meta = mp_meta;
15090 
15091  basic_node node;
15092  node.swap(*this);
15093  p_meta->anchor_table.emplace(anchor_name, std::move(node));
15094 
15095  m_attrs &= ~detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring;
15096  m_attrs |= detail::node_attr_bits::anchor_bit;
15097  mp_meta = p_meta;
15098  auto offset = static_cast<uint32_t>(mp_meta->anchor_table.count(anchor_name) - 1);
15099  detail::node_attr_bits::set_anchor_offset(offset, m_attrs);
15100  m_prop.anchor = anchor_name;
15101  }
15102 
15108  void add_anchor_name(std::string &&anchor_name)
15109  {
15110  if (is_anchor())
15111  {
15112  m_attrs &= ~detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring;
15113  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15114  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15115  mp_meta.reset();
15116  itr->second.swap(*this);
15117  mp_meta->anchor_table.erase(itr);
15118  }
15119 
15120  auto p_meta = mp_meta;
15121 
15122  basic_node node;
15123  node.swap(*this);
15124  p_meta->anchor_table.emplace(anchor_name, std::move(node));
15125 
15126  m_attrs &= ~detail::node_attr_mask::anchoring;
15127  m_attrs |= detail::node_attr_bits::anchor_bit;
15128  mp_meta = p_meta;
15129  auto offset = static_cast<uint32_t>(mp_meta->anchor_table.count(anchor_name) - 1);
15130  detail::node_attr_bits::set_anchor_offset(offset, m_attrs);
15131  m_prop.anchor = std::move(anchor_name);
15132  }
15133 
15137  bool has_tag_name() const noexcept
15138  {
15139  return !m_prop.tag.empty();
15140  }
15141 
15147  const std::string &get_tag_name() const
15148  {
15149  if FK_YAML_UNLIKELY (!has_tag_name())
15150  {
15151  throw fkyaml::exception("No tag name has been set.");
15152  }
15153  return m_prop.tag;
15154  }
15155 
15161  void add_tag_name(const std::string &tag_name)
15162  {
15163  m_prop.tag = tag_name;
15164  }
15165 
15171  void add_tag_name(std::string &&tag_name)
15172  {
15173  m_prop.tag = std::move(tag_name);
15174  }
15175 
15183  template <typename T, typename ValueType = detail::remove_cv_t<T>,
15184  detail::enable_if_t<std::is_default_constructible<ValueType>::value, int> = 0>
15185  T get_value() const
15186  noexcept(noexcept(std::declval<const basic_node &>().template get_value_impl<ValueType>(
15187  std::declval<ValueType &>())))
15188  {
15189  // emit a compile error if T is either a reference, pointer or C-style array type.
15190  static_assert(!std::is_reference<T>::value,
15191  "get_value() cannot be called with reference types. you might want to call "
15192  "get_value_ref().");
15193  static_assert(!std::is_pointer<T>::value,
15194  "get_value() cannot be called with pointer types.");
15195  static_assert(!std::is_array<T>::value,
15196  "get_value() cannot be called with C-style array types. you might want to "
15197  "call get_value_inplace().");
15198 
15199  auto ret = ValueType();
15200  if (has_anchor_name())
15201  {
15202  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15203  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15204  itr->second.get_value_impl(ret);
15205  }
15206  else
15207  {
15208  get_value_impl(ret);
15209  }
15210  return ret;
15211  }
15212 
15218  template <typename T>
15219  void get_value_inplace(T &value_ref) const noexcept(noexcept(
15220  std::declval<const basic_node &>().template get_value_impl<T>(std::declval<T &>())))
15221  {
15222  if (has_anchor_name())
15223  {
15224  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15225  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15226  itr->second.get_value_impl(value_ref);
15227  }
15228  else
15229  {
15230  get_value_impl(value_ref);
15231  }
15232  }
15233 
15238  template <typename ReferenceType,
15239  detail::enable_if_t<std::is_reference<ReferenceType>::value, int> = 0>
15240  ReferenceType get_value_ref()
15241  {
15242  if (has_anchor_name())
15243  {
15244  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15245  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15246  return itr->second.get_value_ref_impl(
15247  static_cast<detail::add_pointer_t<ReferenceType>>(nullptr));
15248  }
15249  return get_value_ref_impl(static_cast<detail::add_pointer_t<ReferenceType>>(nullptr));
15250  }
15251 
15256  template <
15257  typename ReferenceType,
15258  detail::enable_if_t<
15259  detail::conjunction<std::is_reference<ReferenceType>,
15260  std::is_const<detail::remove_reference_t<ReferenceType>>>::value,
15261  int> = 0>
15262  ReferenceType get_value_ref() const
15263  {
15264  if (has_anchor_name())
15265  {
15266  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15267  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15268  return itr->second.get_value_ref_impl(
15269  static_cast<detail::add_pointer_t<ReferenceType>>(nullptr));
15270  }
15271  return get_value_ref_impl(static_cast<detail::add_pointer_t<ReferenceType>>(nullptr));
15272  }
15273 
15277  void swap(basic_node &rhs) noexcept
15278  {
15279  using std::swap;
15280  swap(m_attrs, rhs.m_attrs);
15281  swap(mp_meta, rhs.mp_meta);
15282 
15283  node_value tmp{};
15284  std::memcpy(&tmp, &m_node_value, sizeof(node_value));
15285  std::memcpy(&m_node_value, &rhs.m_node_value, sizeof(node_value));
15286  std::memcpy(&rhs.m_node_value, &tmp, sizeof(node_value));
15287 
15288  swap(m_prop.tag, rhs.m_prop.tag);
15289  swap(m_prop.anchor, rhs.m_prop.anchor);
15290  }
15291 
15296  iterator begin()
15297  {
15298  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
15299  {
15300  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit: {
15301  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15302  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
15303  return {p_node_value->p_sequence->begin()};
15304  }
15305  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit: {
15306  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15307  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
15308  return {p_node_value->p_mapping->begin()};
15309  }
15310  default:
15311  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is neither of sequence nor mapping types.",
15312  get_type());
15313  }
15314  }
15315 
15321  const_iterator begin() const
15322  {
15323  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
15324  {
15325  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit: {
15326  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15327  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
15328  return {p_node_value->p_sequence->begin()};
15329  }
15330  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit: {
15331  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15332  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
15333  return {p_node_value->p_mapping->begin()};
15334  }
15335  default:
15336  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is neither of sequence nor mapping types.",
15337  get_type());
15338  }
15339  }
15340 
15346  const_iterator cbegin() const
15347  {
15348  return begin();
15349  }
15350 
15356  iterator end()
15357  {
15358  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
15359  {
15360  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit: {
15361  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15362  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
15363  return {p_node_value->p_sequence->end()};
15364  }
15365  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit: {
15366  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15367  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
15368  return {p_node_value->p_mapping->end()};
15369  }
15370  default:
15371  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is neither of sequence nor mapping types.",
15372  get_type());
15373  }
15374  }
15375 
15381  const_iterator end() const
15382  {
15383  switch (get_node_attrs() & detail::node_attr_mask::value)
15384  {
15385  case detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit: {
15386  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15387  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_sequence != nullptr);
15388  return {p_node_value->p_sequence->end()};
15389  }
15390  case detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit: {
15391  const node_value *p_node_value = get_node_value_ptr();
15392  FK_YAML_ASSERT(p_node_value->p_mapping != nullptr);
15393  return {p_node_value->p_mapping->end()};
15394  }
15395  default:
15396  throw fkyaml::type_error("The target node is neither of sequence nor mapping types.",
15397  get_type());
15398  }
15399  }
15400 
15406  const_iterator cend() const
15407  {
15408  return end();
15409  }
15410 
15416  reverse_iterator rbegin()
15417  {
15418  return {end()};
15419  }
15420 
15426  const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const
15427  {
15428  return {end()};
15429  }
15430 
15436  const_reverse_iterator crbegin() const
15437  {
15438  return rbegin();
15439  }
15440 
15446  reverse_iterator rend()
15447  {
15448  return {begin()};
15449  }
15450 
15456  const_reverse_iterator rend() const
15457  {
15458  return {begin()};
15459  }
15460 
15466  const_reverse_iterator crend() const
15467  {
15468  return rend();
15469  }
15470 
15471  private:
