15476  const node_value *get_node_value_ptr() const
15477  {
15478  if (has_anchor_name())
15479  {
15480  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15481  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15482  return &(itr->second.m_node_value);
15483  }
15484  return &m_node_value;
15485  }
15486 
15487  detail::node_attr_t get_node_attrs() const
15488  {
15489  if (has_anchor_name())
15490  {
15491  auto itr = mp_meta->anchor_table.equal_range(m_prop.anchor).first;
15492  std::advance(itr, detail::node_attr_bits::get_anchor_offset(m_attrs));
15493  return itr->second.m_attrs;
15494  }
15495  return m_attrs;
15496  }
15497 
15498  template <
15499  typename ValueType,
15500  detail::enable_if_t<detail::negation<detail::is_basic_node<ValueType>>::value, int> = 0>
15501  void get_value_impl(ValueType &v) const noexcept(
15502  noexcept(ConverterType<ValueType, void>::from_node(std::declval<const basic_node &>(), v)))
15503  {
15504  ConverterType<ValueType, void>::from_node(*this, v);
15505  }
15506 
15507  template <typename ValueType,
15508  detail::enable_if_t<detail::is_basic_node<ValueType>::value, int> = 0>
15509  void get_value_impl(ValueType &v) const
15510  {
15511  v = *this;
15512  }
15513 
15517  sequence_type &get_value_ref_impl(sequence_type * /*unused*/)
15518  {
15519  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit)
15520  {
15521  return *(m_node_value.p_sequence);
15522  }
15523  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a sequence.", get_type());
15524  }
15525 
15529  const sequence_type &get_value_ref_impl(const sequence_type * /*unused*/) const
15530  {
15531  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::seq_bit)
15532  {
15533  return *(m_node_value.p_sequence);
15534  }
15535  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a sequence.", get_type());
15536  }
15537 
15541  mapping_type &get_value_ref_impl(mapping_type * /*unused*/)
15542  {
15543  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit)
15544  {
15545  return *(m_node_value.p_mapping);
15546  }
15547  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a mapping.", get_type());
15548  }
15549 
15553  const mapping_type &get_value_ref_impl(const mapping_type * /*unused*/) const
15554  {
15555  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::map_bit)
15556  {
15557  return *(m_node_value.p_mapping);
15558  }
15559  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a mapping.", get_type());
15560  }
15561 
15565  boolean_type &get_value_ref_impl(boolean_type * /*unused*/)
15566  {
15567  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit)
15568  {
15569  return m_node_value.boolean;
15570  }
15571  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a boolean.", get_type());
15572  }
15573 
15577  const boolean_type &get_value_ref_impl(const boolean_type * /*unused*/) const
15578  {
15579  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::bool_bit)
15580  {
15581  return m_node_value.boolean;
15582  }
15583  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a boolean.", get_type());
15584  }
15585 
15589  integer_type &get_value_ref_impl(integer_type * /*unused*/)
15590  {
15591  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit)
15592  {
15593  return m_node_value.integer;
15594  }
15595  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not an integer.", get_type());
15596  }
15597 
15601  const integer_type &get_value_ref_impl(const integer_type * /*unused*/) const
15602  {
15603  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::int_bit)
15604  {
15605  return m_node_value.integer;
15606  }
15607  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not an integer.", get_type());
15608  }
15609 
15613  float_number_type &get_value_ref_impl(float_number_type * /*unused*/)
15614  {
15615  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit)
15616  {
15617  return m_node_value.float_val;
15618  }
15619  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a floating point number.", get_type());
15620  }
15621 
15625  const float_number_type &get_value_ref_impl(const float_number_type * /*unused*/) const
15626  {
15627  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::float_bit)
15628  {
15629  return m_node_value.float_val;
15630  }
15631  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a floating point number.", get_type());
15632  }
15633 
15637  string_type &get_value_ref_impl(string_type * /*unused*/)
15638  {
15639  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit)
15640  {
15641  return *(m_node_value.p_string);
15642  }
15643  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a string.", get_type());
15644  }
15645 
15649  const string_type &get_value_ref_impl(const string_type * /*unused*/) const
15650  {
15651  if FK_YAML_LIKELY (m_attrs & detail::node_attr_bits::string_bit)
15652  {
15653  return *(m_node_value.p_string);
15654  }
15655  throw fkyaml::type_error("The node value is not a string.", get_type());
15656  }
15657 
15659  detail::node_attr_t m_attrs{detail::node_attr_bits::default_bits};
15661  mutable std::shared_ptr<detail::document_metainfo<basic_node>> mp_meta{
15662  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(bugprone-unhandled-exception-at-new)
15663  std::shared_ptr<detail::document_metainfo<basic_node>>(
15664  new detail::document_metainfo<basic_node>())};
15666  node_value m_node_value{};
15668  detail::node_property m_prop{};
15669 };
15670 
15675 template <template <typename, typename...> class SequenceType,
15676  template <typename, typename, typename...> class MappingType, typename BooleanType,
15677  typename IntegerType, typename FloatNumberType, typename StringType,
15678  template <typename, typename = void> class ConverterType>
15679 inline void swap(basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType, FloatNumberType,
15680  StringType, ConverterType> &lhs,
15681  basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType, FloatNumberType,
15682  StringType, ConverterType> &rhs) noexcept(noexcept(lhs.swap(rhs)))
15683 {
15684  lhs.swap(rhs);
15685 }
15686 
15693 template <template <typename, typename...> class SequenceType,
15694  template <typename, typename, typename...> class MappingType, typename BooleanType,
15695  typename IntegerType, typename FloatNumberType, typename StringType,
15696  template <typename, typename = void> class ConverterType>
15697 inline std::ostream &operator<<(
15698  std::ostream &os, const basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType,
15699  FloatNumberType, StringType, ConverterType> &n)
15700 {
15701  os << basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType, FloatNumberType,
15702  StringType, ConverterType>::serialize(n);
15703  return os;
15704 }
15705 
15712 template <template <typename, typename...> class SequenceType,
15713  template <typename, typename, typename...> class MappingType, typename BooleanType,
15714  typename IntegerType, typename FloatNumberType, typename StringType,
15715  template <typename, typename = void> class ConverterType>
15716 inline std::istream &operator>>(std::istream &is,
15717  basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType,
15718  FloatNumberType, StringType, ConverterType> &n)
15719 {
15720  n = basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType, FloatNumberType, StringType,
15721  ConverterType>::deserialize(is);
15722  return is;
15723 }
15724 
15726 inline namespace literals
15727 {
15729 inline namespace yaml_literals
15730 {
15731 
15732 // Whitespace before the literal operator identifier is deprecated in C++23 or better but required
15733 // in C++11. Ignore the warning as a workaround. https://github.com/fktn-k/fkYAML/pull/417
15734 #if defined(__clang__)
15735 #pragma clang diagnostic push
15736 #pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wdeprecated"
15737 #endif
15738 
15744 inline fkyaml::node operator"" _yaml(const char *s, std::size_t n)
15745 {
15746  return fkyaml::node::deserialize(s, s + n);
15747 }
15748 
15755 inline fkyaml::node operator"" _yaml(const char16_t *s, std::size_t n)
15756 {
15757  return fkyaml::node::deserialize(s, s + n);
15758 }
15759 
15766 inline fkyaml::node operator"" _yaml(const char32_t *s, std::size_t n)
15767 {
15768  return fkyaml::node::deserialize(s, s + n);
15769 }
15770 
15771 #if FK_YAML_HAS_CHAR8_T
15777 inline fkyaml::node operator"" _yaml(const char8_t *s, std::size_t n)
15778 {
15779  return fkyaml::node::deserialize((const char8_t *)s, (const char8_t *)s + n);
15780 }
15781 
15782 #if defined(__clang__)
15783 #pragma clang diagnostic pop
15784 #endif
15785 
15786 #endif
15787 
15788 } // namespace yaml_literals
15789 } // namespace literals
15790 
15791 FK_YAML_NAMESPACE_END
15792 
15793 namespace std
15794 {
15795 
15796 template <template <typename, typename...> class SequenceType,
15797  template <typename, typename, typename...> class MappingType, typename BooleanType,
15798  typename IntegerType, typename FloatNumberType, typename StringType,
15799  template <typename, typename = void> class ConverterType>
15800 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cert-dcl58-cpp)
15801 struct hash<fkyaml::basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType, FloatNumberType,
15802  StringType, ConverterType>>
15803 {
15804  using node_t = fkyaml::basic_node<SequenceType, MappingType, BooleanType, IntegerType,
15805  FloatNumberType, StringType, ConverterType>;
15806 
15807  std::size_t operator()(const node_t &n) const
15808  {
15809  using boolean_type = typename node_t::boolean_type;
15810  using integer_type = typename node_t::integer_type;
15811  using float_number_type = typename node_t::float_number_type;
15812  using string_type = typename node_t::string_type;
15813 
15814  const auto type = n.get_type();
15815 
15816  std::size_t seed = 0;
15817  hash_combine(seed, std::hash<uint8_t>()(static_cast<uint8_t>(type)));
15818 
15819  switch (type)
15820  {
15821  case fkyaml::node_type::SEQUENCE:
15822  hash_combine(seed, n.size());
15823  for (const auto &elem : n)
15824  {
15825  hash_combine(seed, operator()(elem));
15826  }
15827  return seed;
15828 
15829  case fkyaml::node_type::MAPPING:
15830  hash_combine(seed, n.size());
15831  for (auto itr = n.begin(), end_itr = n.end(); itr != end_itr; ++itr)
15832  {
15833  hash_combine(seed, operator()(itr.key()));
15834  hash_combine(seed, operator()(itr.value()));
15835  }
15836  return seed;
15837 
15838  case fkyaml::node_type::NULL_OBJECT:
15839  hash_combine(seed, 0);
15840  return seed;
15841  case fkyaml::node_type::BOOLEAN:
15842  hash_combine(seed, std::hash<boolean_type>()(n.template get_value<boolean_type>()));
15843  return seed;
15844  case fkyaml::node_type::INTEGER:
15845  hash_combine(seed, std::hash<integer_type>()(n.template get_value<integer_type>()));
15846  return seed;
15847  case fkyaml::node_type::FLOAT:
15848  hash_combine(seed,
15849  std::hash<float_number_type>()(n.template get_value<float_number_type>()));
15850  return seed;
15851  case fkyaml::node_type::STRING:
15852  hash_combine(seed, std::hash<string_type>()(n.template get_value<string_type>()));
15853  return seed;
15854  default: // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
15855  fkyaml::detail::unreachable(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
15856  }
15857  }
15858 
15859  private:
15860  // taken from boost::hash_combine
15861  FK_YAML_NO_SANITIZE("unsigned-shift-base", "unsigned-integer-overflow")
15862  static void hash_combine(std::size_t &seed, std::size_t v)
15863  {
15864  seed ^= v + 0x9e3779b9 + (seed << 6u) + (seed >> 2u);
15865  }
15866 };
15867 
15868 } // namespace std
15869 
15870 #endif /* FK_YAML_NODE_HPP */
